The place is clean and the service is good. They accept foreigner. Would recommend others to stay at her places. Although it's a bit distance from the metro station, however they provide transport services to send you there. It's great.
Everything was perfect. You won't regret it.
Perfect place for going to Shanghai Disneyland. They gave us a ride from and to Disneyland in the morning (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication was great and we enjoyed our stay very much!

Nice place quite and save could walk after three I trouble them with showing up late every night but they never complain.. lil bit away from the city center but the metro is in a walking distance would consider booking again
Very clean and spacious place, with in an amazing location with a great view! The family is very accommodating and made us feel very welcome. Would stay again
Great place and location. The host was really quick in replying to my messages.

I loved the place - it is cozy, comfy, stylish and comfortable.  The building is a little old but the place is very newly done. The host was fantastic responding to my tens of messages almost instantly! I liked that the place was conveniently located <10 min walk to the metro, right across a park and very close to Xintiandi.

Xiao__ fastest is nice, helpful and most importantly his responses is really quick. 

Place is at the back alley, really easy.. just couple mins walk to the front to (right) huai hai middle road or (left) Xintiandi

Just one thing is that the floor don__ seem to be very clean tbh, so better wear slipper or sandal in the house. Place can be really creepy and scary after sundown, really dark like some haunted house lol i freaked out for the first few nights but u__l be fine after awhile. There will be kitten hidden behind the washing machine, make sure you don__ get scared by the kittens cus i did as it dashed out when i first checked in haha, fed the kittens too. 

Very local, safe and nice experience. Its a perfect place for one or two pax! 

Awesome stay! Cosy, comfortable and nice with Japanese wooden style. A lot better than i expected. Would totally recommend this place!
Nice place and I enjoyed the stay
Nice location and superior inside design

Cosy room with nice view, clean bathroom and all you need for basic accommodation in Shanghai. Live like a local, sleep in comfort and have privacy in this little gem. Great value for money - this is not a fancy hotel or the like, but charming in another fashion which I found appealing.
Smell badly while under construction. Also It is noise because of construction in the morning. Hot water does not come out at night. I do not think I will choose next time.

This place was seriously fantastic. I stayed in Shanghai for about 6 nights in her place and loved it. It__ somewhat difficult to get checked in at night, so make sure you have your flashlight on to get the key box. 

Outside can be a little interesting but once you get inside the room, fantastic place. Smells good, clean, and has a washer. I was able to wash some clothes while at the place which is an added bonus. Bath towels are not provided for bring yourself.

The location is amazing. Across the street from one metro stop and walking distance to another two stops. 

Host is also super responsive. If you__e coming from the states, download (Hidden by Airbnb) so you can text there easily.

Once again, for the value, excellent. I__ give it 10 stars if I could for these reasons.
Perfect location, lovely small loft with all the comforts 3 min walking from the sub.

Great place to stay in Shanghai. Accessible to everywhere, we were able to cycle to all the good spots. There are narrow stairs so something to be mindful of if you have big bags which we had. But overall fantastic apartment.

Wonderful place close to the metro. Pay close attention to the photo check-in process. The place is a little difficult to find if you are not used to this type of neighborhood. Once we found the place everything was great. The neighbors are also very nice if you get lost. I could live in this place for a very long time and definitely recommend staying here. It's clean, smells good, and has everything you would need.

Because of a problem with the water pipe we changed from the little apartment to Xiao__ house. He texted us 2 days before and made sure we had everything we needed.
Xiao__ apartment was very cozy, in the middle of the city close to metro line 2. So very easy to travel to all touristic places. The owners are very guest free and friendly and they are happy to help you with any question. The room is stylishly decorated . The apartment is easy to enter with the code on the door, no keys needed. I would recommend Xiao__ place to everyone who likes to travel with Airbnb and likes to have a local experience in Shanghai!
Really nice space! Puts you in the heart of shanghai!

It__ a great place to live in! 
Nice interior design and nice location too!
__¸¸__è¿_¸ªairbnbï½great location, great neighbors, great host, great room.
The host is great! He helped me with quick response directions and toping up my phone!
Great, cheap, lots of good food around, and close to metro if you need anything else. I would stay again.

Fantastic location, not a bad price. But the host was completely unwilling to help with issues. The washing machine didn't want to wash, and we were told to, "just try everything".

Toilet was getting clogged all the time. 

Looked for alternative places, canceled and left a week early which cost us a lot of money. If the host was responsive and sorted out our issues, this would have been a 4/5 place. 

But if you can't wash your clothes and you can't go to the toilet, it's a pretty big disaster.

really nice place for a stay night,only 4 bed in one room was a good ponit for me

Spacy apartment with an afforested yard near Lujiazui CBD, and metro line 9 within walk distance connects it to the downtown. Simple and stylish furniture, nice design found in details: the stone table in the yard may inspire you for a backyard picnic, and the water hose offers some deeper interaction with this temporary accommodation. Feel at home, lay back in the couch and watch some movies with the projector. 
Equipment for the kitchen and bathroom meets basic demands. Dryer is not functioning very well but there is a fan heater in the bathroom, it works.

Apartment is very clean with a cute, private balcony attached to bedroom. Kitchen and bathroom facilities are new and updated. Only 1 flight of stairs walk up and less than 5min to subway. Definitely recommend!
Great location, plenty of space for two people and quick responses. Would definitely recommend!

Fiona's place had a fantastic location! The apartment was  a two minute walk from the line 2 and 11 which made the city feel very accessible. The main road was beautiful with plenty of nearby restaurants - both Chinese and Western. A great park for running or walking was only 10-15 minutes away. For foreigners who need to register with the police, the station is a five minute walk from the apartment and very easy to find. The space itself was a cosy two bedroom apartment with a small living area/kitchen and bathroom. It was a great home base for days spent exploring Shanghai. Fiona speaks great English and was always quick to respond to questions or comments!
Definitely good value for money. Highly recommended.
This home is in a great location. Very close to metro and lots of places to eat. Internet was was fast and reliable. The host is very nice and willing to help with any situation and give good advice.

Perfect location! Super close to subway stops and around 10-15 min walks to those famous restaurants/bars/pubs. The balcony is great too especially when you want a place to hangout and talk with your friends!

Local neighbourhood, walkable distance to two metro stations , very quiet at night, short walk to convenience store. 
The house looks exactly like in the picture. 
Very helpful and kind host. He makes sure we have check in and got everything we need. I would recommend this place if u like the Shanghai style loft house in local neighbourhood.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Zhan__ place is in a VERY local, almost rural area of Pudong and although seemingly close to the airport, it is still a 25min drive to the international terminal. There is very little to NO English information or services in this area, so if you don__ speak the language be prepared to use a translator. 
This can add to the charm of travelling in a foreign country and along with Zhan__ brother who helped with check-in, the local shop owners were kind and hospitable.

Tiger__ place is good, clean and convenient. I feel it__ suitable for family of 3. It__ very close to some hot tourist spots in Shanghai. Transportation nearby is very convenient. There are 2 subway lines that you can take pretty much to everywhere you want in Shanghai. The walking distance is around 7mins each line. The room decor is very trendy. Definitely will choose to stay here again if I traveled to Shanghai!

Tiger was a great host. His place is very nice and conveniently located in the city. Getting to the metro from his place is seamless and  the views from the bedroom window of Pudong are superb. I would definitely stay ate Tiger's place again anytime I'm in Shanghai.

Nice accommodation for both city escape and business trip. The transport links are just perfect (two metro lines in easy walking distance). Smelly and Dirty corridor along the way from ground floor to the unit.

Great place. The only thing is I specified that we wanted bedding for the couch bed and we still had to message the host and ask for the bedding to be brought. Also, just be aware that the shower is very small! However, it was a good place to stay.
Amazing place, well located, very clean, good communication with host and with nice amenities. Totally recommended

The location of this apartment is centrally located, however, with that comes a lot of noise from a car downstairs. Also, as with most all places in Shanghai, be prepared to carry you bags up the steepest stairwell I have discovered. The apartment can be difficult to locate, so I recommend finding it in the daytime. The host was very responsive and the apartment was clean (bring your own cork screw!).

The host is very nice and very easy to communicate. The house is at a good location and very convenient.
But in the evening it__ quite noisy because the house is at a very busy street. Don__ recommend to take big luggage to there because the stairs are super narrow and steep. The hot water is slow and small but OK for me!

Yang's room in the French Concession is clean, convenient, and comfortable with all the essentials--perfect for short and long stays for business or pleasure. 

Yang was a super lovely and accommodating host. My flight was severely delayed and she kept in contact with me the entire time, and even greeted me (at 2am) at the entrance to her neighborhood and helped me carry my very heavy luggage up five flights of stairs. She is also an excellent cook and shared her home cooking with me!

I stayed with Yang during a work placement in Shanghai and it was perfect for  my needs. Great location, directly in the city center, easy to reach both business and leisure areas. Yang is a fantastic, very helpful host. She was very accommodating and helped me settle in and enjoy my time. I would definitely recommend for everyone to stay with Yang.

I love this place! Location-wise, it__ very convenient and right at the city center of Shanghai. Yang is super nice and communicative as well; she even helped me carry my two heavy bags upstairs. Highly recommend her place if you wanna find some budget accommodation in SH.

I stayed at Yang__ for 2 1/2 months and it was honestly one of the best Airbnb experiences I had! Yang__ apartment is so clean and she__ such a lovely host. The location is perfect for travellers who want to explore the city and close to many good restaurants and bars. I highly recommend others to stay here and will definitely stay with Yang again!

Yang is an extremely caring Host. If you wish so she leaves you alone and her space is very quiet. However, if you seek help or simply a conversation she is more than happy to engage with you. 

When I arrived she helped me carrying my luggage and helped me also to send a package by post. 

Since, the washing machine is in her room, she washes even the clothes for your. Moreover, she makes sure that there is always enough drinking water in your room. The room has many possibilities to store your luggage and is well adapted for long-term stays. 

Yang is a lovely Host ! I pretty much enjoyed staying at her place.

Yang is a very affable & hospitable host! The room is nicely prepared and the location is just wondrous. I will give it a 11/10 =) 

Also thanks so much for going through the trouble of couriering my travel adaptor to Hangzhou where I__ currently staying. Super appreciate that!

It was THE MOST BEAUTIFUL APARTMENT which i have ever seen in the real life!! If this place gonna be more central I would stay for whole trip and not picked only as plan B after the another host cancel my reservation. In each way...this plan B was surely way nicer & comfy than plan A

The apartment is great value for the price, and there are a couple of convenience stores and restaurants within walking distance. However, the bathroom had an issue with some ants and bugs on the floor.
The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Yajun__ place is beautiful, cozy, convenient, comfortable and really cool. It__ centrally located for a great stay in one of the most fun neighborhoods in Shanghai. It__ close to major subways, right next to a bus stop and easy to catch a taxi. Yajun was super helpful and very hospitable. Really a great deal for Shanghai!

Yajun was a great host, she helped with our check-in as well as with some unrelated problems we had. The house has a modern touch to it and is in a very authentic neighborhood. Was great staying at this airbnb thank you Yajun!

Perfect little spot for our Shanghai adventure. Super close to the metro (if you are a foreigner don__ be scared of the metro it__ the easiest way to get around!). The place is in a little alley, and when we visited there was construction on the building... so LOTS of early morning noise. The stairs getting up were intensely steep and hard to navigate with big suitcases. But the place was adorable! Seriously so cute, felt like staying in what we call a __iny home_ in the US. Super clean. Host was amazingly helpful and gave great suggestions as well as directions in Chinese, which is a must if you are using a taxi. Everything was really clean. We loved it!
She's very helpful and had a great property. The place was spotless clean and had plentiful amenities

Great location less than 5 minute walk from Xintiandi station. Near several shopping centers, convenience stores, and a gym, Will's. Yajun recommended several places to visit including the gym I listed. The space was comfortable for two guests. Heads up - there is no shower curtain

What I like:  The location is amazing. The check-in was very easy. The host responded in-time and try to solve all the pop-up issues and give luggage storage tips.
What I dislike:  The flat does not look as nice as shown in the picture. Too many filters applied in the pictures.  The sofa bed was broken when we arrived. The cleanness definitely needs to be improved although there is a cleaning lady.

Bright and cheery and excellent location, walking distance to so many restaurants, cafes, bars, and sights. Nice hot shower and well laid out space. The stairs are quite steep getting up to the apartment, as other reviews have mentioned, but other than that it was a very convenient space and very pleasant. I would definitely stay here again!
Super convenient location. A couple minutes away from the Xintiandi metro station. Check-in was mega easy as well. Jun let us check-in two minutes early.

Good location to shopping and not far from metro station.Room were clean but only problem that if you have big luggages because you need to carry up  the step by yourself.
Host is very nice and she has her team to help you for any question.
Room is a bit small from what you have seen in the photo.

Warm regards
Nuttanicha

Excellent Location in Shanghai!
A well equipped cozy department, we (our cat included) had a wonderful memory here.
Jin provided detail check in guidance, easy access for us.
Very charming space! We loved staying here.

The flat is a cozy corner in a very real part of Shanghai, with an excellent location and many bars/restaurants nearby. Yajun is very quick in responding and the self check-in is extremely convenient. The price is very reasonable considering the location and comparable peers!
The place was great! Great location.

Excellent location! We walked to Xintiandi and Tianzifang and were right near a very convenient metro station. The street this place is on has  some cute coffee shops and little restaurants and bars, also. The place looks newly remodeled and was comfortable. The one small drawback I would mention is that the decor wasn't as tidy and polished as in the photos.

There are pros and cons to this place.

Good general location
Relatively cheap
Modern interior
Good communication

Cons
Very small
Located within a very old buildibg
The pictures are decieving

This place is OK to stay but only for a night or two. The bed is very hard and the bathroom is pretty much in the living area. 

The location is good and if you like to walk you can easily navigate to some of the tourist spots.
Great location near to the metro station
Nice, clean, and very convenient place with lots of nice restaurants and bars around it

I greatly enjoyed my two day stay in Jun's apartment.  It is well located, just 4 or 5 minutes stroll from Xintiandi Metro station and therefore lots of choices for eating and easy access to the whole city.

Jun's instructions for finding the apartment were excellent since finding places in these small Chinese lane systems can be a challenge.

The apartment is great with a nice view of the street and by Jun's own admission the stairs up to it are a little steep and narrow but other than that it was great and the neighbours are very friendly.
aiyi was very thoughtful and helped us when the airline lost our luggage!
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host is very hospitable and nice and the location is very convenient (next to the subway). Would definitely book again!

Roxanne is a great host and happily answered all the questions I had. The home is small but tidy and nice and quiet compared to most places in China. It's a little tricky to find but Roxanne is a great help and gave some local tips as well. Metro station and restaurants just a short walk away, overall great place to stay - highly recommend.

Roxanne is a super nice host!! 
The house is very very beautiful and is indeed a place for people to relax, plus very convenient location(bars and restaurants within walking distance)
Definitely will come back again!

Roxanne could not have been a more wonderful host- she communicated very quickly, had a beautiful and clean space right in the heart of the best neighborhood in Shanghai, and checked in with me several times to ensure I was having a good stay. She is so thoughtful and lovely, and the bungalow is so charming and sweet. I would recommend this place to anyone in a heartbeat and hope to be back soon someday! Thank you Roxanne!
Great great location, close to metro, close to restaurants and shops, and Xujiahui Park.

What a gorgeous place to stay!  It is a small house in the middle of the French Concession part of Shanghai, and,  although small,  it has a small living room, a bedroom with a good double bed, a small kitchen and small bathroom. But all space is very efficiently used.  Roxanne is very communicative; she answers questions you may have fast and good (in proper English). A metro station is nearby, as are restaurants, bakery and other shops.  Roxanne had sent us a nice document with restaurants and other information. But let me not forget to mention the (again small) stunning place outside, where you can sit (quietly) in the shadow between all those nice plants and flowers.  A highly recommended place to stay.  One advice: although Roxanne's route description is excellent, it is good to have a maps app (with gps) on your mobile at hand. And remember: (Hidden by Airbnb) is blocked, unless you have a VPN or a Hong Kong based mobile card in your mobile phone (Website hidden by Airbnb) )

The Apartment is just wonderful! it is super stylish, you feel very safe, you have a nice terrace to sit outside, there is no noise from the streets at all, there are supermarkets, restaurants, shops and a metro station just a few minutes away. The host Roxanne is so kind and helps you out with everything! I highly recommend this apartment when staying in Shanghai!
Great place near city centre with lots of restaurants n food stalls.  Host responded quickly. Small place but cosy n clean.  Good for long or short stay.
Great apartment with the most beautiful little garden! Within walking distance to metro lines. Space is just nice for 2 people. Roxanne was great and friendly. Highly recommend!
Lovely place to stay! Quiet and great location!

Roxanne's place is stylish, clean and quiet. Good location in the French concession. Very near metro, shops, and restaurants. She was very helpful making sure we could find the apartment and answering all questions quickly. We would gladly stay again.
A super loving and thoughtful host. come with a few heaters to warm us up in freezing cold weather.  I love the garden too. its a good place to take photos.

Roxanne is a very responsive host and provided us with the walking routes and dinning suggestions nearby. We took a taxi from the Hongqiao Airport to her place and cost 49 RMB. Roxanne assisted us to direct the driver over the phone so he knew where to drop us off.  It__ very easy to explore the former French concession area from Roxanne__ place by foot. Her apartment is small but cozy, we got everything we needed for our stay. The highlights of her apartment are the skylight, floor heating system, washer/dryer and the little garden just outside the front door. I was very impressed how well she maintains her garden. The best moment in the morning is sitting in the hanging pod chair and enjoying the coffee in the garden.

This was the most pleasant stay me and my boyfriend have had! The apartment was clean and cozy with a lot of facilities. We can cook our own food! The location is convenient! We have a great host too.

The house on the outset was tidy and the area was decent too with convenient stores and Columbia Circle (a historical compound now used for restaurants and office space) and Disney is not so far.

[Disclaimer: I usually keep the following type of comments in the back of house but because I was mislead by the previous guests comments I have chosen to put this here]

I don__ know what you will get but when I was there, there was dust on most surfaces. The smell of smoke on the bed and even worse on the couch. On the floor there were dead bugs, dust and crumbs with the occasional cockroach. The toilet had dust, and urine all over it - on top of that, the sink was extremely dirty with someone__ shaved hair clippings on it. The shower had hair all over it and a cream shower curtain with black and brown marks at the bottom most likely caused by the blockage not allowing the water to go down quick enough. The microwave and fridge door had sticky marks and so did the pots and pans that I was expected to cook with and the cooking utensils still had food on it. The glasses and mugs had dust and a special glass had hand and lip marks on it.

THE BED. Had no sheets but a blanket on top of an uncovered mattress and I was expected to use a quilt which did not have a cover either suggesting that all Airbnb guests share this with me probably without any wash in between judging from the smell or they literally wash it every time idk. And last but not least the cleaning cloths. I was not financially in a position to get up and move to a new place because I would have if I could. So, I tried to clean some areas with the cloths that were as dirty as the apartment.

The host was smoking right until the intimate entrance of the door. Not cool.

The WiFi was inconsistent and eventually stopped working in the last two days and Unicom has little coverage there. 

The hosts son, however, was extremely considerate and very helpful with the WiFi issue.

Your apartment has so much potential if it were just clean. And it doesn__ have to be of Michelin star standard but just clean enough to stay comfortably.

It was super clean and nice flat. It was kinda hard to recognize the number of same building of apartment at night so I had to call the host and she was so generous and kind to come out and pick me up... Just good to spend there it was very clean and well organized and highly recomman this place :) thanks è°¢è°¢ä½____
It__ a cozy room with a nice view of Pudong,tidy and clean. Daisy is welcoming and caring . I had a great time there.
Great place,super clean and super nice host. The bed was comfortable enough. Definitely recommend others to come!

It was amazing staying with Daisy!! She is super friendly and thoughtful. She allowed us to check in a bit earlier and to check out a bit later. 
Her space it__ amazing like no complains AT ALL!! Clean, that bed can fit 3 people, you have your own bathroom inside of the room, the view is stunning the room is big like perfect. 
You can also cook, wash and iron your clothes. Theirs towels and slippers as well but not toothbrush ( only toothpaste ) so prepare your own. 
Her compound it__ amazing, they have a indoor and outdoor pool, we only tried the indoor and it was 80Â¥ per person you need the swimsuit and the hat. 
From her place to Shanghai tower it takes 40 minutes by bus. The nearest subway station is Lancun Road ( line 4 ) and it takes 20 minutes walking to get to the apartment since I am a lazy human being I took a didi and it__ around 13/14Â¥. 
To go to the clubs or bars takes 20/25minutes by didi/tÃ¡xi it costs around 30-45Â¥ if you take the subway it takes 1hour. 
Overall I would def recommend it to my friends and share the taxi bills, the space is nice and Daisy it__ amazing!
very clean and tidy. Nice hostess. Perfect experience.

My stay at Daisy's place was not at the right timing, which led to quite a bit of inconvenience for me.  I'll say it here so the next person can avoid the mistake I made. 
My trip took place on heavily rainy days in Shanghai. Now the place is in a big big gated community. The way that the ground was built doesn't seem to let rainwater flow down to the underground easily, which leads to big big deep pools of water. I was wearing only water-resistant shoes. I tried to call Didi, and Daisy told me Didi could get inside. However, every time I opened the app, it kept telling me to walk to the gate instead. Not to mention, it was very hard for me to get wifi inside the community. After 45 minutes passed with no way to get a Didi, I decided to just walk to the metro station, which is 20 minutes away. Now there are some bus lines outside the community, but none would take me to my destination. 
About the place: As I mentioned, it's inside a big gated community, so it's better to come by during day time. Although if you get lost, you can talk to the security guards. Daisy's communication is quick and fast too. The community is beautiful, green and clean. It's definitely a place for middle class Chinese. Her place is on the 18th floor, so the view is spectacular. I also find the fact that it's near a busy highway to be quite...poetic. Her place is clean, even for the kitchen, and is very quiet at night. There is this one dude who crashed on to sleep in the living room at night. I find it odd that I wasn't informed about him, but his presence didn't bother me much. I wish Daisy could have given a big bath towel for me though. All in all, however, it's a nice place. It's one of the first airbnb I stayed in Shanghai that is clean and beautiful inside and out - many of them are either only clean inside but the neighborhood is yuck!
Fast answer, good service, totally recommned
Daisy has been a great host with hospitality and friendliness, perfect experience with very clean room and nice apt, would recommend for all the friends around the world, thanks daisy!
safe and nice view in downtown
Amazing place, it__ the same as the photos, don__ mind about the area, it__ normal for Shanghai but the apartment is amazing! My girlfriend and I enjoyed it a lot! 100% recommended

The view is spectacular. You won't even need to go to the Bund to squeeze with all those people because you have it there at your window. Pretty close to the MTR and right across the street from the W Hotel. The place is exactly like what you see in the pictures. Wi-Fi in the room was not very fast so hopefully you won't need it. Other than that it's a place I would come back to again next time I visit.

Host gave me directions to another location that was posted on the Airbnb website, creepy guy walked inside while sleeping before Check out and stared at me and my girlfriend naked under blankets even after yelling to leave, elevator doesn__ work so expect to walk 8 floor up on grimy Chinese stairs, no dryer or hanger to dry clothes, overall sucks don__ get fooled by the __iew_ it isn__ worth it..

Stylist room with spectacular view, you can see Shanghai landscape from bedroom window. We mostly have homemade dinner by window. Moreover, the room has big space to lay luggage__ around. Great view and great location. The nearby mall is very convenient as is Cruise City, and it's just a short walk from the Bund and Nanjing Road.

æ±__ place is in an ideal location, and has tremendous views. It it only a short 2 to 3 minute walk from the metro. In addition to this, there are also a lot of local shops/foods within walking distance (1-2 miles) of the flat. Our views were a bit muddled by the fog and rain showers, but we did get some good shots.
My one piece of advice would be to make sure to check in before dark. The gate to the apartment entry is under security guard watch and they leave and lock the door once it gets dark.
All in all, a great place for the price.

Alles recht ordentlich. Super Ausblick auf die Skyline. Allerdings eine recht alte (abgenutzte) Ausstattung (Bett/Bad). Es ist aber nichts defekt. Auch sonst ist alles vorhanden was man braucht. Das Zimmer ist recht klein, fÃ¼r 2 Personen aber ausreichend. Das Haus ist auch in einem sehr abgewohnten Zustand, stÃ¶rte uns allerdings nicht. In der unmittelbaren Umgebung gibt es ein schÃ¶nes neues Einkaufszentrum mit tollen Restaurants (Thailaden/Erdgeschoss top). Mit dem Privat Taxi kommt man fÃ¼r ca. 2 Euro bis zum Fernsehturm. Der Bund ist fu_lÃ¤ufig zu erreichen. Man kann von einer sehr guten Lage sprechen. Insgesamt eine gute Unterkunft.

But since we were late we had to wait a bit till the security came to open the gate for us, Jiang lived far from the airbnb so she cant be there to escort us. Jiang will give you a password to access her unit so make sure you have (Hidden by Airbnb) to communicate.

The home was very pleasant and spacious, beautiful city view, nice decor, 2 soft pillows, AC, clean bathroom, has a fridge, washer (in chinese), and fast wifi. 

Tip: If you do come late, the Bund will not be on at 12am so make sure you come before 10pm to take your night pictures from the airbnb because I didn't know it would be off at a certain time. Get a Chinese SIM card to get around by didi taxi (for cheap and can pay with cash!). 

The negatives I had to say was that the water temperature for the shower was either boiling hot or freezing cold so me and my boyfriend had to wait awhile to change to the right warm temperature. The bed was quite hard but I'm okay with it but if you're not use to sleeping on a hard box spring mattress like my boyfriend then make sure you use the other pillow as your back support lol.

We didn't get the new code until we  asked the staff across the street at the W hotel. Regardless, it is still a great place even though we had a small problem.

Amy was super helpful and her place was very clean! She went above and  beyond our needs to ensure we had a taxi to and from the airport (even for our late departure at 3am). She was so so helpful and for that I am incredibly thankful. She does not speak english, but I was able to converse with her just fine using (Hidden by Airbnb) translate. If you need to talk to someone, they usually typed in something on a translate service to let you know what is going on. Upon arrival, we had to wait because our room was being cleaned, but the host let us know via a translation on his phone. Everyone was so helpful on this property! This location is very close to the Chuansha Metro stop (which runs directly to the airport). It also has a Lawson Store on the corner of the building for buying simple necciesties such as snacks and water. This property functions kind of like a microtel (there is a very small front desk where we waited while I room was cleaned upon arrival). Although it's a little far from the heart of Shaghai, it's very close to the airport and Disney. I would definitely stay again. Thank you for taking care of my party, Amy!

It is a great place. Even though it is Airbnb, the staff cleans the whole place every day.
Thank you very much to Amy. Her place was very clean and comfortable,very helpful and fast response.
Posh place! Had a nice exp. Good host!
It was a nice stay. They make all efforts to help you in anything.

Very nice and tidy. It has 2 rooms can fit 4 people. Also a sofa and a mattress may fit more. Good service people. Free shuttle to Disneyland saves us lots of energy.  Free luggage keeping service after check-out, to say, saved 1 day fee because we went to wildlife zoo after check-out and back to pick our luggage about 7:30 PM. Don't forget to hire a power bank from them (probably free) before you to Disneyland. I ignored then got flat battery at middle of the day so took less photos.
Perfect location for visiting Disney land. Host is very responsive to all my enquiries.

She__ petty cool.No matter where are you come from,she will take you if she can.And the service can__ be better__lean,comfortable,and homelike.You can even travel here just for living in such a suit.You will love it.
The house was cozy and warm during winter which was very important. It looked exactly the same as in picture. The stay was good and comfortable.
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Really nice accommodation! Recommended! We love it. Host can speak English well and respond quickly to our messages. We had a cozy night with friends.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
It__ a wonderful experience with Dooriya. She is an enthusiastic and outgoing girl. I really love to chat with her. New friend!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Excellent host! Comfortable ground floor flat, easy access, well positioned for subway and shops etc

We stayed in the apartment for one day. The location is very near to airport. The house was clean. 

Host also left us a gift - big melon. It was delicious. Thanks.

Jiahui was an excellent host. Very friendly, responsive and even helped us to arrange airport transfers to her apartment. Her place is within a few minutes walk to Chuan Sha MRT (line 2), suitable for those looking to be near the Pudong side of town. Apartment was clean inside, accurately described and looked similar to the photos. Lots of good food nearby, some good restaurants in Bai Lian Shopping Centre (across the road) serving Beef Steamboat, Mongolian BBQ and various Chinese cuisine. At the lower end of the food spectrum, there are lots of cheap eating places just down the road, tasty food costing less than RMB15 per person.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very good host,very good communication,nice apartment!!!
Great experience. Clean and quiet, well decorated and furnished in high standard. Free underground parking. 10 minutes by walk to the old town. Highly recommended!
Nice little place, very well located in Shanghai. Maggie is a lovely host and was always helpful, when I had a question.

Entering the building is kinda like a throwback to old shanghai with its narrow stairs. But once you enter the BnB. It's super modern, clean and thoughtfully designed. Quite amazed how such a small room can be so functional. And the location is great too. 
Also the egg pancake-ish store opposite makes for a pretty good breakfast.
She responses so quick which was petty helpful.
Very clean & new equipments calm private Villa only far from metro station
The place was very nice. The host turned in the AC to heat up the room before I arrived - very considerate. This place feels like home.
Absolutely scenic and modern styled interior design!

Thomas__ place was in a great location. Thomas was very helpful and replied straight away to us. The apartment was  clean and looked like the pictures displayed on Airbnb. There was everything we needed in the apartment including umbrellas, slippers, toothbrushes etc. 
The only things to note were, the inside of the building was run down and the tv was difficult to use. Make sure you ask the host for the WiFi password before you arrive. 
Overall, great value for money and highly recommend.
Thomas' place was sparkling clean and located in an extremely accessible part of Fuzhou Lu. I couldn't have asked for a better stay.
Clean and great location. See wai tan from your window!
unit interior is as pictures but access to unit is challenging i.e. old stairways poorly lit. however, as shanghai is an old city, it can be expected.

Wonderful Location
Convenient Transportation
Comfortable Environment
Kind Host
Quick Response
All in all,which is a very happy staying in Thomas_ place.
Very near to bund. Great location. If having holiday. Thomas place is really great to take choice. Do not judge by its cover. Please see inside 1st..

Thomas's apartment is a clean and stylish place in a great location near the bund. Thomas is a kind and helpful host as well. Overall this place is a bang for the buck, and I would highly recommend it.

The place is slightly less clean than the pictures would suggest. There were a few bugs around the apartment and in the shower. The entrance is a bit sketchy and quite old. The amenities are slightly less good as the price would suggest. The location of the place, however, is phenomenal and right on the Bund. Very close to great restaurants and bars.

Huge house, there__ alot of space to put luggage. Room is clean as well. Much more than what you need. However, the compound outside the house (lift) is quite dirty. There was actually pee in the lift the second day we stayed and we took the stairs instead. (but not the owner__ fault) Other than that, a good place if you__e looking to stay a night for disney or rushing to the airport, but there__ nothing else in the area. Cant even find a family mart when we wanted some water and the nearest train station is about 2km away. The owner would get a driver for us when we needed one and the ride to the train station is about 30RMB and to the airport is about 50RMB. Great place if you just need a day or two, otherwise, it__ realllly far from the town.

Rebecca is a very nice host. Me and my boyfriend lost our suitcase on a taxi. We felt hopeless and lose. At the moment I think Rebecca may help us and I tried to contact her. Thank you for her quick response that made us feel claim. After the long journey, she was happier than us by finding which taxi that we took. I have to say we wouldn__ have a nice trip without Rebecca! Thank you Rebecca! We will see u next time!
Very nice host with warm heart! Nice to talk with you:) See you again next time traveling Shanghai!

Nice, well-equipped place with great location. 
Really nice host as well:)

Herr Yang hat am Ende andere Wohnung mir gegeben, nicht gleich wie ich gebucht habe.
Die Service ist ok, aber mir gefÃ¤llt nicht, dass die _nderung nach der Bestellung und auch den Preis erhÃ¶rt sich.
In Zusammenfassung wÃ¼rde ich nicht weiter empfehlen.
Fantastic apartment, great location. Beautiful decorations and view. Would recommend and stay again!
This is a very modern house with trendy deco and modern furniture.. We like the house so much
The place is amazing and the area is really nice and cosy. Only the kitchenware could be better cleaned but other than that everything is nice!!! Def recommend a try

Great location and accommodations.  Even had a 24 hour accessible gym downstairs.  Close Starbucks and convenience store downstairs.  Great communication with host and great check in process.  Would highly recommend.
A comfortable place to be in.

The apartment looks just like it does in the photos. Comfortable, clean and a short taxi ride to SNIEC (~10 mins). The area within the condo's compound was nice and soothing, and there is a convenience store in the next block and restaurants further up. All within walking distance. Customer service responds swiftly and checking in/out was simple. The only downside was the hard bed, but overall it was a good stay!

Second time staying here and will stay every time I return to shanghai.  Great location with a convenience store and metro minutes away.  Easy to get to.  Clean and safe location.  Host is attentive to your comfort and is easy to get a hold of if needed.  The apartment had everything I needed and extras that were unexpected like clothes steamer.   Would recommend for anyone visiting shanghai.

My friend and I stayed here for a few nights before we moved into our dorms. The view of the city was incredible. The apartment is just as pictured, but the beds are a bit firmer than either of us would have liked, but it was suitable for our short stay.
Our host was fantastic. Fast to respond to all our enquires. The apartment was clean and has great views and very close to restaurants, supermarkets and the metro. We enjoyed our stay in Shanghai
Great location and accommodations. Easy to get to. Great communication. Very happy with my stay.
Very well designed and convenient apartment, located in a nice area close to the centre. The host is very responsive.

It was really lovely place to stay. The location is just perfect, it__ close to lots of heritage buildings; walking distance to railway station; the surrounding areas are very good for walking or biking, you can pretty much get everything in short walk. Especially it__ so quiet at night time so I always get good sleep. Hosts are very nice and easy to communicate and easy to reach. This is surely the place to stay when travel to Shanghai. I will stay here again when I am back. Thanks to Shaolei and the team!

Great stylish place to really conveyed the local shanghai living experience in a super charming neighborhood that is great for walking around in October weather. Hosts were very responsive. The place is stocked with all amenities. The washing machine a little bit hard to work with though.

The room is located at an area which was once in French Concession and it is also close to a underground station. Here you can see the old culture and the new culture meets and makes it a distinct place to stay. There are fancy bars and cafes around the house while some traditional shops selling Bao, Siu Mai and Zongzhi nearby. As for the room itself, it is not only in a fashionable design but it got everything I needed there. The host set up floor heating system in the bathroom, sunroof in the kitchen, big cable TV and clean and easily-sleeping bed. I can feel that the guests do matter to the host and they care for our staying experience in their room! In general, it is really a good deal to stay at this room with the price and I will definitely recommend it to my friends.

Really great place to stay, even for longer. Lot's of decoration details, fully working kitchen with supplies, very comfortable bed and super fast, English speaking hosts. I can only recommend it!!
Very nice apartment in the center of the former French concession.

Very cute and cosy place.

Only down side is phone connection was bad, zero signal at times + internet was not really work (aside from vpn). So it's more a getaway rather than a spot to work at.

We found the location excellent and in a very quiet, friendly and peaceful lane.  We were New Zealanders so a little perplexed about the rubbish sorting but after studying what other people were doing we learnt what was expected.  It was a very interesting experience for us staying in a Lane House and we were so glad we had the opportunity.
I had a wonderful stay. Location superb in the French concession with easy connection to metro, plenty of shops , restaurants. Quiet and peaceful. Host is very quick to response to any enquires.
We really appreciated Shaolei's very prompt communication. Thank you also for the help, this was a kind gesture. We would like to come back and stay again.
My fav airbnb place BAR NONE!!
great location. convenient check-in andout. quiet place to stay.

This location is perfect to get away from modern shanghai while staying in shanghai. The rustic outside was beautiful while staying in a fresh clean modern day inside. The locals were friendly. Vegetable market and Lawson was convenient. Beds were comfortable. Ample storage space. Easily accommodates 3 people.

Great experience, the place is absolutely lovely. Every little detail is calculated in order to provide a beautiful visual experience . Roxanne has been precise and attentive , I__ sure 100% I will rent again in the future . 
I was amazed to see how much did she took care of plants  it was everything very beautiful. Nothing was missing everything was perfect . 
If you rent in shanghai don__ miss her Airbnb :)

Will definitely go back to Roxanne's place for my next trip in Shanghai! She thought about every single detail in her design and decor, it's lovely! The house is well located in Jian'An district of Shanghai and is close to many urban lifestyle stores. The communication with Roxanne is very easy, she speaks English and Mandarin and she cares, her warm personality makes my stay very enjoyable. Thank you very much Roxanne for this wonderful experience, all the best!
Nice place in a good location. Roxanne communicates well and is very helpful.
I love Roxanne__ place! It is so clean and the place is very well decorated with plants and flowers. The location is convenient and with a lot of good restaurants around.

Roxanne__ apt may just be THE most convenient place in the city. It__ close to one of the major subway lines and puts you within walking distance to several must-see neighborhoods like French Concession, Jing An, etc.

The apt itself looks exactly as shown, and what__ more included eco-friendly amenities like laundry detergent and soap which we really appreciated. 

Finally, she went out of her way to make our stay as comfortable as possible, and was extremely prompt and responsive to all our questions. We look forward to staying over again on our future visit!
Appartamento piccolo ed intimo, ideale per una coppia. Arredamento molto curato e posizione fantastica. La padrona di casa Ã¨ gentile, conosce l__nglese e risponde ad ogni domanda molto velocemente.

We left the apt this morning. 200% recommended!  It was a great experience staying at RoxanneÂ´s place. Everything was perfect: very cozy apartment, clean, good location and the community was really quite so we could rest well. We use a lot Airbnb and we can say Roxanne is the best host ever definitely! Thank you very much again and hope to see you soon one day.

Location is great. Within 5 mins walking distance from mrt. The room is exactly as shown in the pictures. Cosy room. Roxanne knew that we wanted to use the washing machine and went out of her way to get us washing detergent and even sent us detail instructions on how to operate the washing machine.

Roxanne's fern home is absolutely gorgeous, with so many thoughtful amenities and touches (I especially loved using the tea set to drink the high mountain oolong tea she provided each night). The location is superb, just a few minutes walk away from the Jiang'an station, which has access to line 2 (connected to many of the famous tourist spots AND the airport!). Roxanne herself was also very generous and kind, quick to respond to our questions before and during our stay, and eager to provide tips and suggestions on the best places to visit and eat. Would definitely recommend this place!
One of my best Airbnb experience. The host is very thoughtful and she even brought me Taiwanese nougat :) will book again if I go back to SH

AMAZING stay! The apartment itself is very sweet - the perfect size for 2 people. Lots of plants and natural touches - The host Roxanne is a landscape designer and you can feel her skill for design all over the apartment. Roxanne was fluent in English and went above and beyond to help my boyfriend and I. The loft is located in a very chic, romantic neighborhood of Jing__n temple but the building itself is tucked away down a little side lane. An extraordinary value for the money and a great home away from home in Shanghai! Highly recommended.

Roxanne has been an amazing host. Her place is so cute, very welcoming, clean and the location is great. 
I had a hard time forgetting my bag in a taxi, and she could help me and was so reactive. Thanks again for everything _
Wonderful apartment to stay in if you__e working at while in Shanghai. Very convenient location. Roxanne is a wonderful host and provides a stylish apartment with great atmosphere.
Roxanne is such a nice host! So helpful and kind! We had a truly nice stay. The place is also very nice and convenient. We will come back here next time too definitely!

Very convenient location, cozy place with thoughtful amendities, everything was perfect. The room was not big but it magically offers beyond everything we need. The host Roxanne also gave us a lot of thoughtful tips. It made our trip so easy and enjoyable. I felt lucky to have found this place. Thanks for everything!

I was so happy to stay in this Airbnb!! Great stylish and beautiful deco!! I was surprised how beautiful it is and felt so good with all the thoughtful amenities!! All items r in good qualities n with great brands!! And, the host Roxanne s super friendly, helpful and lovely!! She n I had spent some time n had a coffee nearby. Such a passionate and loving host!! I definitely will book this Airbnb for my future stay in SH!! N, I could stay as long as possible as it s like a cosy home located just next to few big shopping malls!! N, I did some good shopping and loved the supermarket there. I highly recommend this Airbnb and the host  Roxanne!! :)

Rox is a great host. She started communicating with me before my trip even began which put my mind at ease as this was my first time visiting Shanghai. Her responses were prompt and she was very helpful when it came to answering any questions I had. Her place was just the perfect size and in a great location. One of the best Airbnb experiences I've had. I will definitely be recommending her place to family and friends visiting Shanghai. Awesome work Rox, you made my stay in Shanghai a memorable one.

Yuan__ apartment represents the best local life of Shanghai. It has the best location, minutes walking to the biggest shopping mall in Asian and also various lines of trains. The apartment is cozy and cute, it has very precise decoration and every quipment that you would need. 5 minutes walking to line 11 can take you to Disney land directly. I hope everyone can have a good consideration to take Yun__ apartment as you choice in Shanghai.

I stayed here few months, the area is convenient, few subway stations nearby. Flat is renovated, there is no elevator, but host helped me on check in and check out with my luggage. Host is friendly and helpful, she reply to messages fast. The flat is same as on the pictures, its pretty spacious. I enjoyed my stay here

This place is definitely awesome for those who wanna explore old SH and it__ cross-culture environment! Although it takes patience for one to find Ricky__ house at first time. But he offered a detailed routes for me on how to get to this place so don__ worry. Ricky is friendly and offers may helps on how to check in. But our schedules make us lost chance in deeper communication. If I have chance to go back one day it will always be one of the best places one can choose to enjoy traveling in SH!
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Lovely and spacious apartment in the local zone. It also has great location, in which it__ convenient to access to lots of historical buildings. Lastly, good bargain compared with hotels in this area. Absolutely five star!
It__ a really good appartement with extraordinary design. It__ worthy of choosing it. One of the most remarkable things is that we can use directly the vpn WiFi router.

Great location! 
Ricky has provided detailed directions to the apartment. He__ very considerate and helpful with our requests. 
Apartment is clean and comfortable.

Ricky__ place is amazing! Located at a very strategic location with easy access to convenient store and transportations. He is a very good and friendly host too! Allowing me to check in earlier and check out later due to my flight time. Thank you for making my Shanghai__ experience complete with no trouble!

Me, my wife and my parents stayed at Ricky__ place for a whole month while we enrolled in Chinese language school. We had no idea about shanghai or the neighborhood but we lucked out as for us it was easily the best neighborhood in shanghai. The area is like west village in New York and there are tons of good restaurants, bars and cafes in the immediate vicinity. The apartment is part of a traditional shanghainese neighborhood block so you feel like you__e still getting an authentic feeling of shanghai. The apartment has a traditional entrance but the apartment itself is very modern and westerner friendly. The AC works super well which was important for us and Ricky provided us with all the drinking water we needed while we were there. He was super responsive, providing us with a spare key via a friend - SUPER helpful! We enjoyed our stay very much and would highly recommend.
I recommend this place for a family. The dining/living room is spacious.

The flat is about a 10-15 minute walk to Tianzifang and Dapuqiao station which is great. Neighbourhood is nice, but flat was dirty upon arrival, dusty everywhere and crumbs were on the tabLe. Need to get your own toilet paper and towels, and while there is a kitchen, there is nothing to cook or clean with. There is a TV for show but it is just a screen. Note this is a room not an entire place and does not have a private entrance. The family you live with are friendly but they are cleaning before 8am everyday and you will hear it. Had initally booked for a month but left a few days early and would likely not return...
Villa was a nice place to hangout with friends. We arranged a BBQ through the owner which we enjoyed a lot
very nice journey with beautiful room and nice landlady. very convinient location. you can take subway to everywhere of shanghai easily  0 distance to the subway station

We had a very convenient stay! The apartment looked exactly as in the pictures, it was very cosy, clean and comfortable. Check-In was super easy with the instructions provided. The neighbourhood seemed safe as well. The flat is located on the 5th floor so you need to carry your luggage a few steps upstairs. During winter it is a little cold, but there a two electrical heatings. I can definitely recommend the apartment!
I am very grateful to the landlord for letting me have a pleasant trip. ,thank you!

The room is really close to subway station, only 30 seconds by walk. It was very clean and everything I need were there ( e.g. towel)  Before I stay I worried about none elevator, but it was totally OK for me.
Good location. No lift, that is the only issue

The host is really friendly, prompt in her reply and thoughtful gesture do matters. The place deco looks exactly the same as the photos shown. Is definitely a good location however be prepared to carry your luggage a few steps. Its a old building with no elevator so it's really for you to totally blend into experiencing the reality of the locals. We didn't expect much so is really still within our expectation. Easy to check in, just be sure your phone still have battery for you to switch on the lights if you are going out early or going back late as the corridor along the stairs ain't turn on. 
Subway is just near the building less than 2mins walk, and walkable distance to convenience stores, places to eat and shopping malls.
It can be really cold in the morning if you step out of the room to go to bathroom even though the windows are closed.

Very nice place to stay in Shanghai. Old, authentic building in Luwan district. I love this location. It is next to the metro station and you can reach many places by walk or bike.  Around the apartment, there are plenty of great restaurants. Chinese cuisine as well as some western style bakery or fast food. 
The apartment itself is rather small but enough for one or two people. AC and an additional heater make the place warm enough during cold winter days. 
Communication with Dara and her husband was perfect; they are very kind and support you during the whole time. Thanks again! 
All in all a great experience highly recommended!
You will find Tomi a great host.

Great tip-top communication with the owner with accurate check-in and out instructions. Condominium located in a good Metro accessible location within 3 mins of walking distance and 10-15mins of Metro travel to the Shanghai City. The condominium is newly renovated with all types of furniture, and all items of furniture (kitchen utilities, toilet utilities and beds) are all brand new. Thoroughly recommended for anyone who is looking for a good location, cosy and most importantly a clean place to stay in the City of Shanghai. 5 Stars given to this accommodation across all areas.
Great place, great host, very responsive

Cozy place but a lil too small than it looks in the picture. The location is nice. However, the entrance to the room is full of bugs and spiders as well as around the door. The host definitely needs to put more cleaning effort into the stair and outdoor area. At least keep it bug free. The inside is clean and nice. Overall it__ not bad.
The place is nice and crozy. The host is very helpful and response very quickly. It would be better if there is storage area in the apartment.

The unit is on the third floor without lift, need to travel light. Overall the experience was good. The subway station is about 500m away so be prepare to walk some distance. The response from the owner was superb as he reply immediately. The downside is that the main door to the block has to be open by the owner through the intercom. Felt a bit awkward buzzing the owner when I return late after a night out.

This was one of the best Airbnb's we ever stayed at, the hosts were super lovely and very helpful. The apartment is very central, lovely decorated and super clean. The only downside might be that city background noise is quite prominent as it is so central, so if youre a light sleeper you might want to reconsider. I would recommend it 100%.

The location of the room definitely has won my heart during my stay in Shanghai! It's so convenient that there are 3 metro lines just within 10mins walk from the house. It was also my first time to stay in such old style building and yes, a good experience, especially if you are here to explore like a local and not live in a glamorous hotel room. Absolutely amazing place. Fantastic location, but the room and terrace are so lovely. Our hosts were so kind and left a welcome not for us. They keep water and beverages in the fridge for purchase which was very helpful on our first day. The communication was exceptional. Comfortable bed. Beautiful terrace. Lovely decorations. thank you for hosting me, gorgeous space and perfect location!

PANG HU and LAO YAN well deserved the superhost title. Both of them are easy going and helpful. The location is great. The room is stylish with great details and the view from the rooftop is stunning. Highly recommended.

Jing__ home is central, spacious, and comfortable. My friend and I got lost on our way to her home (Metro Tip: if you are coming from Pudong Airport there__ a metro upstairs that will take you directly to her house. You__l take Line 2 but it will not go all the way down to your stop, which is West Nanjing Road. You will need to get off and transfer to another L2 Train to finish your ride. It is marked underneath the stop names on the train which stops you can transfer at) Jing patiently waited for a couple hours as we made our way to her house without being able to contact her due to a lack of service/WiFi. Once we arrive her and her boyfriend met us at the door and checked us in and made sure we were comfortable. Her house is a quick 10-15 min walk from the train station and is surrounded by local markets, good food, and shops. We were at her house due to a long layover and Jing let us keep our bags inside her home as we killed time around the neighborhood before our flight. Jing ended up doing a tattoo on me and she is truly an impeccable artist and I highly recommend her if you are interested in trying it out. If I were to come to Shanghai again, I would definitely book this place.

The host is awesome, easy to communicate. The room looks exactly like in the pictures, cute, stylish, and clean.  Although it's a little hard to find, the place is well located in one of the dated Shanghai alleys. Close to West Nanjing Rd and Jingan temple area. Overall it's a lovely place to stay, with only one catch -- the stairs going up are narrow and steep, not suitcase friendly.

Jin__ place exceeded our expectation on its location and overall experience. It enriched our stay in shanghai greatly, and we were very happy for this choice! Thank you! Hope to stay again next time. All best wishes,

Jing's place is in a very central location, easy to access from the metro. Place is clean and well kept. I did not get to meet Jing, but she was quick to my responses, even though there was a language barrier she did connect me with her English speaking friend to answer my questions. The address is incorrect on Airbnb, I would check in with Jing on the instructions to get to her place. Being a solo traveller, I did feel a bit uncomfortable going to a location that was different from what was listed. But Jing made me feel safe and provided all the instructions to find her home which was easy to understand.
Very good location to city centre, friendly host!

Jing's place was amazing. The room and location are perfect.  It was easy to use the subway. The location is very close to the city and downtown. Train fares are cheap. We could go everywhere we want. If I had said, we couldn't find her house. It is difficult to find her house for foreigners. However, Jing helped us a lot. She is very sweet. The room is better than I expected. We used the terrace at night. You need careful to go up and downstairs. The stairs are narrow and steep. I enjoyed my stay in Shanghai with her house. I recommend staying at her house.

Great location and very quick communication with host.

Candice and her husband were excellent hosts. They were able to clearly get us to their place where everything was neat and orderly. The air conditioning was cold and the Wifi was quick so we were pleased. Candice's husband also took us to the airport in the morning which was a great relief. I highly recommend!
Candice__ place was really clean and had all the necessary amenities. Thanks for the hospitality!
Rest assured she__ got you. I__ rather take her pick up and drop off services than a taxi.

Candice__ place was very clean, comfortable, and well-appointed. My group of four had plenty of room during our long layover in Shanghai, and the location was very convenient to the airport. Candice and her father went above and beyond to ensure that our stay was comfortable, even going so far as to offer airport pickup and drop off service, as well as an extra ride to the Maglev station. Candice was very responsive to messages and very easy to communicate with. Thank you, Candice and family, for your hospitality.
Clean sheets, fast internet, and hot shower. I had all I needed for travel. Good response in guiding me to the right location.

Candice helped us every step of the way! She was very helpful and her father waited 3 hours for us to get through customs at the airport. We almost forgot our phone in the car and they drove back to return it. Our only issue was being unable to find any food near by that spoke English.
nice and I would come again

The space was as described. the beds were very hard which is comfortable if you like sleeping on a hard bed. The ride to and from the airport was a great touch however, and her father was helpful beyond words. overall a nice stay
The outside of the accommodation is too dark

I missed the message from the hostess so that we had a really hard time figuring out how to get to the house but everything worked out really well after we get there. The hostess and her family were really nice and kind. We enjoyed our stay at Candice__. Thank you.

Great place to stay!! Her father's pick up and drop off service is so convenient and he's super nice! Candice's English is also really good and she is very responsive! Highly recommend! It is a bit far from the main city of Shanghai but that's okay!

Stayed here for two layovers and it was a great stay both nights! Candice is very responsive and her father's pick up and drop off service is very reliable and he's always on time! Highly recommend for a close stay near the PVG airport!

For those looking for a place for quick transfer to airport..this is the right place! We had an early morning flight from Pudong, and Candice's pick up and drop off service make it even easier for us. Her father was so nice to us. He drove us from subway, to and from disneyland and to the airport. Candice was so quick to response to my message. Overall, everything was good!

Had a great stay at Candice's place. It is not too far from the airport but quite far from the city center. The local shops are a treat if you want to experience how the locals live. There are fresh markets as well as a lot of food places around. Would highly recommend if you are looking for a place to stay close to the airport for the night without having to spend much and experience some local culture.

Candice__ home was everything we needed and more. First off, it was an amazing value and it is super close to the airport. My husband and I were traveling with our our two dogs and Candice was so accommodating and made us and our pups feel right at home. The neighborhood is very cute, and you are able to find a Walmart and many places to eat within 1.6 miles of her home, I recommend using a didi as this is a very cheap and convenient option for local travel. Her home was exceptionally clean and the beds were much more comfortable than the typical chinese bed (I have lived in China for a year and my bed was much harder). We truly enjoyed everything about our stay and highly recommend Candice__ home. And as an added bonus the dogs that belonged to other members of the neighborhood were super cute and friendly to our dogs as well! Thank you for such an amazing transition into our new life back in America!
Candice__ place was very aesthetically pretty and clean. Candice always replies very quickly! Her father picked us up from the airport and dropped us off which was super helpful.
We enjoyed our stay here. Amazing hospitality and nearby to the airport.

Candice is the best Airbnb host I have ever had. The space was a bit different than I was expecting (not in the nicest area and a bit smaller than described as a __ouse_) BUT I only paid $30 for it and it was WELL worth the money and a great place to crash for the night. Candace is amazingly responsive and even offered ride service from and to the airport for very cheap, which was so helpful.
Great place if you need to stay close to the airport. Candice is very helpful and super quick in responding to any questions! Thanks!
Great location! Small loft, but great for 1-2 people.

Positive points:
- great location in the heart of Shanghai, in a charming market.
- the room is very well arranged and impeccably clean.
- the host is reactive enough.
- excellent value for money compared to many other similar places for rent.

Negative point:
- the room is in an old Shanghai-style house, so there is no soundproofing whatsoever. The heavy steps and conversations of neighbours left, right and above can be heard clearly. Though said neighbours are also temporary guests, so the noise may vary, or you might even have silence if there are no guests at the moment.

the position is great. 5 mins walk to the metro line 10. the neighbourhood is very pleasant. the neighbours ar very warm. the apartment is as in the pictures, very nice and elegant. the kitchen and the bathroom quite small but ok. the bed was quite hard but it's personal. the comunication with the host was excellent.

The apartment is very nice & cozy, I love the balcony a lot. It's very Shanghai style when the sunlight enter from the balcony, the style of the airbnb is cool as well. Location is good, even thou the stairs to the apartment is a bit dark, it's ok, you'd love it once you enter the apartment. 

They got kitchen and tableware too! Just it maybe a little when you take show, make sure you turn on the heater in the shower room. The host Cloe is nice & friendly, even thou haven't chance to meet her, she's helpful in answering my questions and offering help.

Recommend this airbnb to those wanna stay in Shanghai x modern style apartment

This was a very stylish apartment is a convenient part of the city. We were able to walk (within 10-30minutes) to many of the bars and restaurants we wanted to check out -and the others were just a short taxi/subway ride away. Being directly opposite a movie theater was a nice bonus. The apartment is in an older complex (typical in that part of Shanghai) which made finding the place a bit tricky at night in the rain. If you are arriving after dark it would be good to have a flashlight with you! The bathroom is a bit claustrophobic but there was plenty of hot water. Shanghai is very humid (even in the winter so the bathroom floor was wet most of the time -be sure to make use of those shower shoes. The balcony was great and I bet it is super awesome in the warmer months. Kitchen supplies were minimal so if you are planning to cook you might have to get inventive or drop into the giant supermarket across the street.
Great stay and very much recommended.
It__ a really convenient place for staying. Traditional apartment of old Shanghai residents.

Clean apartment. Well organized host who responds super fast and gives you great tips upon your arrival.
The apartment matches exactly the images in Airbnb. The location is great. 
To find the apartment you need to go through a gate to get to the backyard and enter in to the building. If you are the first time in China, don't freak out if you see the stairwell - it's a bit messy. You can be sure that the apartment is exactly what you expected to be. Cloe is a nice host who answers super fast. Enjoy your stay!

This place is a great example on the importance of interior design. It's nestled in the middle of a low cost flat with surroundings that are quite "salt-of-the-earth". We had a sense of dread walking up and down the flats trying to find the property. But it felt like entering into another world when we finally found it! Which was a pleasant surprise.

It was at first a bit difficult to find the room and I wasn't sure if I was in the right place because of the entrance, which is a bit hidden in the courtyard of a residential building. But as I found the room I was impressed by the beauty of its interiors and the pleasant and cosy atmosphere. You could instantly tell that CloÃ© has taste a hand for interior design. Furthermore, CloÃ© helped me every time I was in need of something. I stayed in Shanghai for three weeks and as I do not speak Mandarin, I had a lot of questions regarding food and Chinese culture. CloÃ© was very helpful and always nice. I especially enjoyed her recommendations for restaurants. She is an expert for food from different Chinese provinces and so my trip to Shanghai turned out to be also a round trip through Chinese cuisine. Thanks to that and to the beautiful and ideally situated apartment near the metro, I had a wonderful stay there and hope to come back soon.

comfy n stylish

It is not good for people who seeking a place to sleep tight. Besides, this room is not soundproof which does affect sleep.

The apartment is close to Line 2's Lou Shan Guan subway station. It is also close to many shops and shopping malls. Very good area. The room has good natural light coming through the window. It is spacious. Two or three days before my reserved check out date, the landlord asked me if I could check out a day earlier than reserved because he had family coming. He offered to give me some money back. Then I started looking for another place to move. Some Airbnb places require 2 nights minimum stay so it was not easy to find a nice place for just one night on such short notice. In the end the landlord allowed me to stay as originally planned. I think he is a good person but perhaps did not at first realize how stressful a last minute request like that can be for a guest. He apologized for this and I accepted his apology.

lovely apartment. clean and stylish. excellent location. friendly and responsive host. thank you!
Pretty good place to stay in Shanghai, convenient and friendly neighborhood.
Amazing place and apartment ..thank you Daniel

This apartment located in the wonderful place and can walk to the metro station within 20min. The room is clean and tidy, it is also quiet enough for resting well. The host is friendly and can speak fluent English, she is enthusiastic to help me.

It was a great stay, everything was as advertised and even better. I totally recommend it especially if you want to experience an authentic Shanghai lifestyle and need a calm place to rest. The host and her family were very kind and helpful. I hope to come back one day, because I already miss them :)
This is a nice apartment in an excellent location. Near to the Bund and Metro. A great place to stay for a week.  It was reasonably priced and Rofaye is an excellent host.

The great place of hotel! Just 10 minutes and you are on the embankment. In total everything is good but we had troubles with lights on the wall.  furniture isn__ new but ok. Very cool bed  soft, not like other beds in china

The apartment itself is great. The host is super professional.   The disappointing thing is that, the area is still developing as a result, the apartment is far from bus stops and there are no stores nearby. I wad lucky because I was able to buy things (e.g. takeaways etc) Online because, I am linked to the Chinese retailing systems.
Overall it__ a good option for a short stay in shanghai. The place is small but comfortable. Getting there can be a bit tricky if you__e not familiar with the area.

Excellent location: cool, artsy, cafe areas are one block away. Room is very small and good for one person and sometimes a visitor but it__ perhaps too small for two people long term. Hot shower, clean bedding, kettle with tea provided. Wifi was very fast. Communication with host was easy. Bed is very comfortable. Building is old and entrance area needs a few repairs but overall this is an excellent room for this price.
Very convenient room for travelers who want to have a private place just for themselves. I found the bed very comfortable and the location is great, with easy access to the metro.
Excellent location! The flat is small but it has everything you need. For that price it__ a good deal!

Fantastic location. In a 1930 heritage building in the heart of French quarter. Cool cheap restaurants around ( i recommend Tai Fan across the road). Quite comfortable and heater/ac works well. Wifi works well. TV. The bed is bigger than expected., although a bit hard for my old back, but that's a matter of taste.. There s little sofa. The room is bigger than expected. There are enough place for storing big suitcase and hangers and shelves for clothes and also a brand new fridge and a microwave. Unbeatable for the price. And I shall repeat: the location is amazing and rather quite for an old house!

A simple room for one person, and the surroundings for life function is complete. 
You should check in&out by yourself, and without any room service. If you care about your living quality, prepare your own toiletry and buy a 4L-bottle of water from convenient store.
Location is really great, but room is really old. It is for only sleeping considering the price.

The Room and its attached bathroom are on the third floor of an antique building which is a part of the Former French Concession that reflects its amazing location. In addition to that there are plenty of shops and convenient stores right outside the neighborhood. 
The place was simple yet pleasant and warm. The range of amenities is convenient. Especially, the heater, AC and the bathroom bulb heater which all together made a huge difference in the current cold weather in the middle of winter. In fact, living in such antique room confers the resident an exceptional experience of living in a different era, the wooden staircase is designed to be helical  and narrow which may troublesome anyone with a large luggage, moreover the wooden staircase creates not easily to  be ignored noise which woke us up frequently early in the morning or in the middle of the night each time a neighbor guest climbing down/up the stairs. Furthermore, as a resultant of the building old-fashion structure which stacks rooms close to each other, residents can literally hear each other while performing their daily home-chores such as cleaning dishes in their kitchen, it can be annoying especially in the early mornings. At the end, I must mention the owner kindness and communicativeness, I experienced that because I usually add the owners on (Hidden by Airbnb) directly before checking-in to smoothen the communication between us, he responded as soon as I sent him the invitation request and he sent me all the relative details for the location, in addition to the passwords of 3 different wifi networks which their speeds varies frequently during the day. 
Over all, good value for money.
