Very nice location and pretty home to stay.

Laurent's place was great! Good location, great amenities, very nice decoration, overall it was one of the best experiences on airbnb we had. Moreover, Laurent is a great host, quick response, and very easy and effective communication.

Laurent is a really nice and helpful person,and the apartment is at the best location of Xvjiahui dis,perfect views,quiet and clean room with nice decorations!!!much better than what i was expecting!will come again!

Great location next to Xujiahui and walking distance to Jiaotong University. Fantastic view of the park. Master bedroom features large windows with electric curtain. Beds were very comfy and slept well. 5min walk to the nearest convenience store. Lots of massages and spas nearby which we took advantage of after a long day of travels and meetings. Would definitely stay again.
2nd time staying in Laurent__ place. Same neat, clean and comfortable as last time. You should try out!
The apartment is located in the center of XUJIAHUI. The transportation is very convenient. The host provides a great accommodation experience for us!Recommend~

We stayed 6 nights in Laurents Apartment. We had a really great stay and everything was clean. The apartment is very central and shops and metro etc. are very closed. There were so many details in the apartment and Wifi. That was very important for our children. Thank you very much, Laurent!

We enjoyed the stay in Laurent's Xujiahui apartment very much. The apartment is perfectly located close to the Metro station, shops, restaurants and of course the beautiful Xujiahui park. The apartment offers a great view on the park and the Shanghai skyline. Pick-up and drop-off worked very well, and Laurent's driver was very friendly. Also the house staff was very helpful solving minor issues. Happy to come again!

We simply loved our one week stay in Laurent's stylish Apartment. It is perfectly located, very central and close to the Xujiahui metro station (line 1, 9 and 11) and bus stop, shops and restaurants. The flat itself is really fantastic, spacious, confortable (high quality beds and sofa) and decorated with great taste, as shown in the pictures. Everything worked perfectly, including reliable high speed wifi. The view overlooking Xujiahi park is amazing. Laurent was a great host, responsive and effective.
This apartment was perfect for our stay! Clean, comfortable beds, great shower, and amazing view. Laurent and his team were always quick to respond and made the stay super easy.
good location, very nice decoration and the master bedroom is very nice
Good place to stay. Great location and nicely appointed.
If the location works for you, this is a terrific apartment with wonderful views and nice amenities. It is a good value.

We were travelling with 2 adults and 2 kids and the apartment was perfect for our needs. If you like this area then this is a great apartment with fantastic views. Just outside the French Concession it has excellent access to the metro which makes just about everything in Central Shanghai accessible in under 30 min. Laurent is a great host and was very helpful in organising a driver to and from the airport but if your travelling with less luggage then the train/metro is easy to navigate.
Laurent__ place is exactly like advertised but the addition of an instructional manual would__e helped greatly.
shopping mall and the subway station is quite close from the apt :)) and the view inside is super amazing!!!

Really enjoyed our stay here. The flat is clean, comfortable and very conveniently located. Great shopping, park, and French Concession are right next door and the rest of Shanghai can be reached by the nearby metro. Laurent was very responsive and made things very easy for our stay. We definitely recommend Laurent__ place!

The inside of the apartment is quite interestingly decorated. It has great view of Xujiahui Park and Wukang Road from the living area and the bigger room but the smaller room is really small and has no view. Beds and sofa are quite comfy. The sink and the kitchen cabinets are basically made for tall people and can be hard to be reached for Asian ladies. One thing to note is the life sized terra-cotta worrier statue standing outside the rooms, to some it is a nice art piece but to some it can be pretty scary.

Great location, close to the metro. The apartment is tastefully decorated and full of character. Laurent showed great commitment to being a helpful host in an extraordinary time in China; he provided helpful advise and excellent communication. I'd recommend this apartment to anyone who wants to be close to the centre of Shanghai but in a more relaxed community.
Great view,make it all worth it

The apartment and location were perfect! Laurent arranged for us a baby bed and chair for our little one. Only downside was the above neighbour who was playing piano the whole night. Not very convenient when you have a little one.
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This is one of the best experience I had with Airbnb stay. (1) The apartment location is convinient, 10 - 15 mins walk to the subway station, where there is a shopping mall, all kinds of food, I picked a steak place,good taste and only 60 CNY. (2) The apartment is super clean and comfortable, I watched TV and movies on the cozy couch. The host is very thoughtful, prepared nice and clean towels, books to read, anti-mosquito medicine even there was no mosquito.  Basically, the apartment has everything you need, just feel like staying at home. (3) Though, There is a street down to the apartment, but when you shut the windows and balcony door, you would not hear anything, it gives you a quite and peaceful night. (4) I didn't talk to the host much since I was out most of the days, but she is a very nice, and I think she is a beautiful photographer.
Very clean appartement, good location and a very nice and helping host
Anna provide me a Lovely place and she is a lovely girl.  I will be back

On the plus side, it is super close to Bulgari. Took me 5min to bike to the conference every morning.  Great location for that. Convenience store options are a bit limited in the neighborhood though. And the apt__ got a whole array of kitchenware. 

On the down side, hygiene seemed to be an issue. Bathroom, kitchen, bedroom and living room could all use a deep clean. The patio is huge but not so well-maintained. Also, because the apt has such a huge patio outside, I noticed quite a number of bugs in the apt, like spiders and ones I can__ name. In addition, the bathroom sink was almost clogged, which was really annoying. And it took five minutes for the water to heat up every time, so turn it on and let it run for five minutes before shower even if you__e an environmentalist cause there__ no other way. :(
Nice space. good host. perfect breakfirst.

It was definitely a pleasant stay at her place. I checked in slightly later than expected and she was really patient and waited for me while she was sick. Felt really sorry and she__ getting better soon. Definitely would recommend and would love to stay again if I get a chance. Outstanding and neat place and super convenient location for transiting!

Great experience. It is closed to the metro station with a Family Mart right next to the station and food markets in the block. The apartment enjoys easy access to Disneyland and Hongqiao Airport. It is definitely your best choice to experience the local live in Shanghai with great internal design. The host is very thoughtful and attentive to set up all the sweet facilities and make you feel at home away from home.

Great place to stay at a wonderful location in the French concession. Place is just as described. Host was very communicative and check in was a breeze. 

QOne thing to note is that you will definitely hear some neighborholy sounds but nothing that is disturbing and can't be brushed off as endearing.
very cozy apartment in great location. checkin was very easy.

I adored staying in this home and would love to make it my regular place for Shanghai visits. It was easy to find compared to many lane houses in the city, thanks to the helpful directions.  And the bed is absolutely amazing!!!!! I only stayed one night but in the morning easily crossed the street for great coffee and baozi which I enjoyed in the little courtyard.
The slug was very good to us and his slime was nice smelling.

The space was quite perfect. High ceilings and tucked away within the other Lane houses. Was very surprised with how little sound there was during our stay (I expected quite a lot, so the occasional shuffling of feet or next door neighbor was most definitely tolerable). Location was superb, and amenities - especially the projector - were fantastic to have. The outdoor area was also a nice escape. Only minor thing is a new door handle - was a bit challenging opening and closing the front door. Eventually got the hang of it though, and super safe neighborhood - 10/10 recommend

Very cosy and comfortable place in a great area of the French Concession. A taste of Old Shanghai on your doorstep, living amongst the locals. Directions from _¶è_ were comprehensive and very helpful. Great having the outdoor courtyard.
Very good location; only minutes' walk from excellent breakfast spots and the iapm mall. Subway line 10 station gets you to Hongqiao airport. There's also a little nice backyard.
A good place to live. Easy transportation and there are nice cafes around.
A good place for short stay.

Patrick is a Great host. Very responsive.
The apartment that I stayed in was clean and well equipped.  The Location was excellent - small shops everywhere with lots of places to eat.  The train was very close by as well.

The place is just like what is in the description. Close to Jiangsu road subway station. The pay tv and air conditioner were superb! Everything you need are well prepared by the host.

Chill is really helpful and flexible! No matter before the stay or during the stay, he try his best to help me. When I said to him the hairdryer was broken, he sent a new one very soon. A nice location as well, even though not __ext to_ station, but it__ not that far, and it__ close to anywhere I wanted to go. The neighborhood is very convenient too.

This place is really clean.  But the building is old and dingy.   However, the people who live there are nice and friendly. The elevator is turned off at 11PM, so you might want to keep that in mind if you are out late.  Also there are two beds.  One in a loft the other on the entry level.  The one on the entry level has no mattress.  I guess this is normal for Chinese people.  I dragged the mattress down from the loft and that worked fine.  One other thing that bothered was the lack of a shower curtain ... which caused the water went all over the toilet and floor.   I think floor is gently sloped, allowing the water to dry pretty quickly.

I really enjoyed this Airbnb experience. Firstly, when I was interested in this Airbnb Andy was really responsive and patiently answered all my questions. The host was super responsive and caring, when we got to the apartment he waited for us near the metro station and showed us the apartment. We had a problem with our phones connecting to the WiFi , he was very patient to come back and helped us fixing it. Whenever I had a question during my stay in Shanghai Andy answered me within few minutes and provided us good information.
The apartment was super nice and clean, matched my expectations. The sheets and towels were new and clean, the beds were okay and the shower was good too with instant hot water. I didn__ understand where to throw the trash but it__ not a big deal. The only thing which worried me when I first came is the building, you could tell it__ old but it turned out that it__ not a big deal you get used to it.
I loved the location, the metro station is two minutes by foot and Nanjing road is around the corner so everything was reachable by foot or few stations away and we didn__ have to drag our laggage for too long. There is also a grocery store downstairs so you could buy whatever you need. 
Another thing, I had a haircut and styled my hair at Andy__ salon I can promise you that you will get a very professional haircut and a great attention. I loved it ! 
So finally I would definitely say that I recommend this stay and would come back again.
Thank you for everything !
Great location. Near MTR and Nanjing Road where you can shop til you drop. Very nice and accommodating host. Good looking too.
Good place but a little far from the city__ landmarks.

Inside of the room was good atmosphere, but there are few street light therefore it was complete darkness in the night.

Can__ really recommend_.The  treasure hunt to find it and get in Could be a fun adventure.. if it__ during the day and you__e not in a hurry or tired and not dragging a lot of luggage....  Host won__ even release the treasure map to find the condo right away first he wants you to get it on we chat then if You don__ have that he wants to email it to you.   Then after I tell him no we chat and give him  my email address it takes 30 minutes to get treasure map!!!  and after all that he sends the treasure map on the Airbnb site like he should__e originally.  The space.... bathroom is in lower level Where anyone over 5 feet will wack there  head To get down there !!  we stayed two nights and I whacked my head once the first night And once that morning then I spent the rest of my time there obsessing over not whacking  my head... The mattress on the bed I think should__e been replaced five years ago!!  it was so soft and mushy...  also although there were cover sheets hanging up there was no cover sheet on the bed making me feel that the bed was not clean .. But at two in the morning I was not ready to start changing sheets so we went with it. Then the shower nothing wrong with the shower but for some reason there was no shower curtain so the water goes all over the floor in the bathroom including over the  filthy plunger which is kept on the floor by the toilet so when you come out of shower you__e walking in water that the plunger has been soaking in...  I__ not positive the room was prepped for us because there was no waters and the first night arriving late and exhausted after forever standing up subway ride I was so flustered from the hassle of trying to find the place and then the treasure hunt to get in..  I left the room key in the front door!! Good thing it__ a lovely rich and safe neighborhood!! So when I text host  that we were locked in I asked him to bring us some waters he brought us two... He did respond and have someone show up quickly... The second morning it was pouring raining and we never stopped for Water__ so I complain why are there no waters and he actually brought a case_ some of these things he can improve but  I promise you we were very glad to check out after two nights!

It was awful, the toilet was filthy and stinks like hell. There were cigarettes butts, hairs and some unknown particles. Water in the shower literally drips out, water was also sometimes cold and some times hot. Bed were hard as rocks, few didn't have mattress only a blanket on top of a metal support. Everywhere else was dirty, never wanna go close to there again.

Small,cozy and beautiful room with old city scenery. Comfortable to saunter down those silent historical streets around. Almost easy to everywhere by metro nearby . Owner can speak English,and gave me some advice.

The room cleanning service was lacking on my first night which I__ refunded. Second day was excellent. 
The host was easy to communicate, responsive and respectful.
Good apartment and good localisation. Reactive host. Only drawback is the bed that is catastrophic.
Had some problems opening the door when we got there and the cleaning lady got there early
The place is the same as shown in the picture. The amenities is great. The location is near to the subway station and also near to the city center. Overall value _¨â__¨â__

I spent a great time in Tiger's apartment. I especially liked the location, you can get to downtown in 20 minutes by walk, or take a subway (1 stop) which is 10 minutes walking away. There are also some food options around and a few supermarkets. 
The communication was very good and the host responded promptly to every question.
The apartment itself is very cozy and clean, and everything was exactly as described in the listing. Also, the night view from the bedroom was amazing.
All recommendations!

This is a very nice apartment, clean, quiet, and safe. It's very convenient to the subway and has a lot of eating places in the shopping center. Tiger replies very quickly to any questions. I liked this place!

I stayed at Tiger's place for 5 nights. Tiger is very responsive and the location is walking distance from multiple subway lines.  Lots of nearby local places to have breakfast/lunch/dinner!  Would definitely stay here again!

Good location. Nice Airbnb. Comfortable bed and good view. The only thing that was annoying is the boiler. It's only good for 1 shower, so need to wait 30 mins to one hour between showers. Other than that everything was great! Would stay again.

The worst flat that I__e ever booked.
Dust, odour in whole flat. The house was very cold, since the air conditioner didn__ work well. Besides that, the building was very dirty with rubbish in the door and in front of the lift. The building is very weird because the main entrance is through a supermarket and everybody can entry to the building. It__ not very secure. 
Last but not least, the host didn__ register our passports in the police station because we were foreigners. He knew it, and even that, he didn__ inform us how to proceed. We asked for help and he refused. In conclusion, the worst experience that I__e ever had.

Clean,  location good, near tube station and many restaurants. a little noisy as many constructions  and a school nearby. Entrance to the building is usually made through a small supermarket on the ground floor but with no safety issue, lift to flat. The flat consist of a sitting room, bedroom and a small kitchen with cooking facility. Had own shower and toilet. There is everything you need for your stay.

Excellent place and host to stay very close to the financial district of Shanghai. Easy access to the Metro station (#2) to travel anywhere in Shanghai by Metro. The room is stylish, clean and equipped with high standard appliances. Highly recommended.

Very good stay, cosy.
Best location for Shanghai.
Many shops, subway in ~10 minutes.

Walking brige, pearl tower, scyscrappers all walking distance as mall shops as well.

Nice stylish appartement in the midst of Pudong. 
Subway just a short footwalk of 5 min away.
Hongmei will answer you any question within short time!

Hongmei is a very thoughtful and attentive host. The location is great, room is clean and  filled w/ (Website hidden by Airbnb) about a 10 minute walk to the Tower.  Lots of shops are located in the area.. around the block is the shopping mall. I Highly recommend her place..When I come back to Shanghai I will most definitely stay at her place again!

A neat and stylish condo in Lujiazui, walkable to a lot of places including restaurants, malls and a 5-min walk to the subway station. Plus, Hong Mei is a very thoughtful and attentive host. Would recommend it to anyone who needs a place to stay in Lujiazui and does not want to pay for the insanely expensive hotels in the area

This place is about 5-10 minute walk to subways. It__ very easy to commute to the tourist attractions. The place is very clean. We arrived before check in time and the host let us keep our baggage (early check in). Our stay at Hongmei__ place was awesome. We will definitely recommend this place to our friends

Dear Hongmei,

Thank you so much for this wonderful stay in Shanghai. Your apartment is stunning and I really enjoyed my stay. I can highly recommend your Airbnb to everyone and will always come back to you when I will be traveling to Shanghai.

Again thank you so much for the great communication and your hospitality.

Best regards
Christian

This is a lovely, clean and well-equipped place, situated close to the metro, restaurants, and shops. The apartment is also stocked with small thoughtful touches, and very comfortable to stay in. Hongmei is a very accommodating host and gives thorough details and check-in instructions. We had an enjoyable stay and hope to back in the future!
Here is the most Wonderful place that i live in Shanghai.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment is beautiful and in the BEST location! One thing we didn__ realise was that there is no fridge, so if you__e planning on cooking that__ probably not possible! However, there are so many restaurants and bars close by so it__ not a problem at all :) Xi was awesome and helped us with police checkin and all our other questions. Would 100% stay again!

location is nice , super clean, everything is as same as picture and Marco is very kind and attentive to any inquries
 one thing is that the room itself is really nice but the building is really old, so before opening the door I was surprised when I walked to the 2nd level because it__ old and some water is on the ground, dark.  I believe that the place is really safe but as a woman and alone, didn__ feel comfortable. but except for that, everything was great
Beautiful, quiet place with great location. The amazing morning sunshine from its big windows is a real plus to my stay and trip in Shanghai.

cute and sweet, would love to come back again

Beautiful space that is bright and airy. It__ clean and spacious. Conveniently located near the subway station. Host was very responsive and ready to help. 

Note, there is one flight of stairs to get to the space. Not a problem if you can carry your luggage and don__ require easy accessibility. 

I enjoyed my stay and this will be the first place I look for when I__ back in the French Concession area. Highly recommend!
A clean and well-located apartment suitable for 1 to 2 people. Our communication with the host was nice and easy throughout the trip, and we enjoyed the stay overall.
The host canceled this reservation 92 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Stayed for one night to leave for the airport the next morning. Host arranged taxi pick up and send over.
Great cute and cozy little loft. Right next to the subway for convenience. My favourite thing was the shower with a glass wall to see through at the shanghai skyline.

Thanks so much for a comfortable and cozy stay! I loved staying here, it is close to everything that I needed and right next to the metro station. The space is well used, so it doesn__ feel small to live in and two people can stay here comfortably. I loved the stylish furniture and finishing touches. It was quick and easy to contact the host throughout my stay and any worries were solved asap. Would definitely recommend for anyone wishing to stay in the area!
Beautifully designed and perfectly clean. We spent a long weekend here and enjoyed this home very much. I would highly recommend. Thank you for being an amazing host!
Very nice and clean house with good personal space.Near to Wanda Square,also with many shops beside.
nice room and feels good to come again
Room really too small, never served breakfast,I will be never staying there again ï½
Very reactive. Many thanks for your support.

Meiling__ place is in a very good location in the Former French concession. It is easily accessible by Metro via Changshu Road station, probably a 6-8 minute walk. There are also buses nearby. As for the neighborhood, it could not be any better. There are lots of local and foreign restaurants and bars nearby.

It is on the second floor of an old apartment building so you will have to walk up one flight of stairs.

The apartment is cozy and compact and has pretty much everything you need. The only issue is the bathroom sometimes had a smell, typical of apartments in the area but hopefully, it can be treated/rectified soon. 

Although we had to rely on translation apps, Meiling was a great host overall, very responsive and looked after us during our stay at her place.
The Appartement is in a nice area and is quite spacious. The host is nice but doesn't speak any english.

I stayed here for two nights over the weekend and couldn't be happier.  The apartment is clean and thoughtfully put together.  Plus, the location is perfect.  You're surrounded by parks, bars, restaurants and coffee shops in a beautiful area of Shanghai.  If you feel like going elsewhere, the metro station is a quick walk from the unit.  

The host was amazing, answering any question or offering help when needed immediately.  She does not speak English, but that was easily rectified with (Hidden by Airbnb) and translation ;). 

Great apartment, amazing location and fantastic host.  Book this place, you will love it.
an enjoyable stay in a good part of the city. slightly surprised to find it was in a love hotel, but not an issue. host very good at answering questions, good value. great projector for films

Exactly as per the photos. Bigger space than most other apartments for this price. All necessary amenities. Very pleasant view from balcony. Comfortable bed. Very nice and responsive host. Good location. Mall and supermarkets around. Bus and metro nearby. Very good stay. :)
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Nice experience and stay at this house!
Very nice and clean apartment! The host was always helpful and very responsive!

It is close to many restaurants like Starbucks and Pain Chaud. There is a bank at the corner and it is closer to little shop for food. It is not to far from the metro. Some of the bed are comfortable and some are really hard. The showers dont have doors/proper curtains so the water was getting all over the bathroom floor. We had to put towel down so catch the water. Except for that, it was a great place
We enjoy our stay here.  Highly recommended.
Very friendly Host and well prepared. Awesome location and easy to find. Will stay here afain next time

Quite a prime location, with 10mins walk to Yong Kang road which has lots of eateries and cafes. It is also about 8mins walk to Jia Shan Road metro station exit 2. Right outside the place was convenient stores/supermarkets, as well as Starbucks/bakery across the road. Overall a good stay!
We are satisfied with the home and the host is friendly
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The carpet in the living room is not that clean, the room is so tiny, the window shadow is broken, too bad.
Perfect location. Close to the train station and lots of food outlets where the station is located.
Very clean spot which was close to food and a mall. Great for our stopover night in Shanghai. We made a last minute booking and the host was very accommodating and communicative.
really nice decoration.  the room is not spacious but contains all the necessary amenities. recommend for short stays

Thanks so much for being a good host. The location is perfect just walking distance to the nanjing east road and subway is very very nearby at the hongyi plaza. Easy for us who are travelling with kids. But was quite shock when we arrived because of the environment outside the house. However, when you enter the house, it is exactly the same as what is being describe in the picture. Lao has been very helpful since we are at Malaysia before we checked in. He gave few tips about shanghai and was very fast in responding. He even prepared some umbrellas for us. That was very thoughtful of him, knowing that shanghai was raining during our stay. Overall, i am satisfied with the stay.
At a great location, with a nice host, you can experience how local people live there, and super easy to access to restaurants and the Bund. Totally worth the value.

The apartment location is perfect, 5 minutes from the Bund. The apartment itself is very well designed, shiny and pretty clean and with 3 double beds. Only thing in the apartment is that the toilet had some bad odor at moments from the pipes so better close the door when not using. Also the air con had a little leak so some water going down. Also the building and floor entrance is a common area for locals to cook, wash, toilet etc. Nothing wrong in itself but this could be informed as a bit shocking when arriving. All in all very good value for this apartment in the heart of the city and very cosy.

Great stay! Didn't expect much due to the location being in an old area, but its definitely much better than seen outside, pictures provided are very accurate. Air con broke down on the second night, but fixed within 12 hours while we were out and never had problems anymore, overall 10/10

Tourist from Malaysia...
Owner is quite responsive and friendly even in the midnight around 2am. 3 beds (2 Queen 1 sofa bed) basically can fit 5ppl of us. Besides, spaceful room and great location. Just walk some few mins and you will see NanJing walk street together with MRT station.

Few things to note.
1. I had checked in at the midnight at 230am. Before walk into owner's  house. The area was dark and creepy without street light, even phone torch was not helpful at all. Not recommended for girls accommodation.
2. Lift to owner's home.
Lift will be off around 11pm and we need to climb stairs to 3rd floor. According to owner, lift is still new and this was their area rules. Luckily, lift was still functioned on the first day in the midnight with the heavy luggages we are holding.

Overall, quite impressive that big difference compared to internal environment (owner house) and external environment (before entering the house). Design and cozy living. Thanks for the wonderful place for living!
The host was quick in responding and the house is exactly like the picture showed. Value for money.
Perfect location. Close to all POIs. The apartment is clean with all necessary facilities. Quick response from the owner.
Location is great. Walking distance to a lot of tourist places

The place is in good location. Near the Bundt (left) and Nanjing pedestrian street(right) and subway  aline 2/10 (exit 3/right) from the main gate. The building is old but the house is nice and neat.The host replies fast.
Great location and very fast response from the host, it was perfect

The stay is at the 3rd floor, there is an elevator to 3rd floor. Host is very responsive & friendly. Host is always helpful. Location is superb, 2 mins walk to Nanjing east road metro station. The building is a bit old but the room provided is in good condition & clean. The room is well ventilated. U can refer to host picture for the room, is almost the same.

The location of this apartment is great, only a couple of minutes from the Bund, despite the building is a bit old and dark, the apartment is very clean and well decorated, it feels you are in 2 different places (outside and inside) We were 5 people and the space was good enough for all of us.  
The only thing we didn__ like it was the conditioner air, it was very cold in Shanghai and we felt the aircon wasn__ strong enough to heat the whole apartment but we could handle it, further the apartment has nice blankets and it we enjoyed the time there.  Thanks to the host for the help and understanding about my checkin time.

Location is a gem right in the middle of Shanghai central next to Nanjing Road, totally value for the price!   Host is really fast in responding to message and help in anyway.  Thank you again in hosting our family for a week at your place :)
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Very nicely situated in Xujiahui. Rojan personally came and greeted me. She informed me everything I needed to know. I got an upgrade from her unexpectedly. Thanks a lot Rojan!

Quiet place. Very gracious and tidy. Close to two central subway stations. Highly recommended choice for one or two person travel or longer stay. You will feel at home here! Just walking distance to central shopping malls and popular sightseeings. The huge window provides u with sunshine and perfect view!

The homestay is very clean and comfortable, with no complicated layouts and everything is just right. Indoor heating feels especially warm in such winters. The location of the house is very good. It is located on West Nanjing Road. There is Metro Line 2 next to it. It is convenient to go drinking and shopping. Thanks for the care of the landlord. I will stay here next time in Shanghai.

Excellent location with easy access to many historical sites and good local food, shopping areas. The building was built in 1930s with lots of history. I really enjoyed live here for 3 days and have a chance to try the local life and recall the history happened here in the pasty 80 years while so many changes happened. 
The room is well designed and carefully cleaned. The neighbor is very friendly which is very good as I did met some bad neighbors when stay in the downtown  BNB in Paris and San Francisco. 
What make us very happy is that it is very warm in the room.  Joyce provided 3 air conditions to keep it warm. It used to be very cold in the room in southern Chinese cities. I kept ask Joyce about the room temperatures before check in. She make her promise and it is really warm.
Although I did not have the chance to meet Joyce, I could fell her hospitality as she always reply very soon. Hope to be able to come back again and stay in this lovely room.

Excellent location, spaces are very clean and neat! Great hospitality!

Our cimmunication is smooth from very begining, Ricky is well travelled, more than me. I am very glad to meet a cool and fun guy who understand and has independent thougts toward our world. He helped me to stall my little but heavy bag for my next stay(à¹__á´__à¹) to his apt, that really gave me convenience. Thank U. Surely, I recommand his place.

Fantastic stay! Ricky is an extremely accommodating host with a terrific place, great French Concession location, neighboring some of the best bars in Shanghai. Place is clean, comfortable, in good shape. One of the better Airbnb experiences I've had.
Great place, great location, great guy! Enjoyed my stay!

Great place in a great location. Very comfortable. Ricky gave us super helpful directions and pictures to help us find our way there. He's also very friendly and has lots of local tips to share. Thanks again for having us!
This is a very quiet and cozy living space , with comfortable and soft bed.  Great  location,friendly host.  I would recommend it to friends.

It was a very good experience staying in Ricky__ Apt.  His apt is in an old style SH Shikumen House with European style inner decoration. Very nice!
I had a private room with a private washroom even if I stayed with Ricky. He gave me lots of personal space but also with quick response when I had some questions. 
The place is in the center of SH and old French concession area. 10 mins walk to Line 13 and 15 mins walk to Line 1/12/10. Very convenient!
The house is located in the centre. There are many good bars near the residence. Btw Ricky is very warm-hearted. I quite enjoy my stay here.
Very nice location, there are a lot of shop, bar and bistro around the house. The living room is comfortable.

Ricky__ apartment is located in the quiet but convenient part of Shanghai. The room is enough big for single to live in. The bed have king size with comfortable mattress( please let me know the brand hahaha). But the sound is a little bit loud in the morning. It is the common problem in old house, so I think the problem is not serious.
Great location! Nice neighborhood of FFC area! Ricky is very nice and helpful host. Definitely recommend to anyone who want to explore Shanghai central area.
Ricky is kind and gentle, had a good night in this sweet house . Wlc to BJ, Hope to see u soon)
Stayed an extra night. Nice place.
Stylish place, located in a great neighborhood, cool host. Everything was great.

Exceptional host and location in the beautiful French Concession.
Ricky's affable demeanor, local knowledge, and warm and welcoming space really helped me settle in, relax, and enjoy my time in Shanghai.
Thank you Ricky, that is really clearly about the direction you sent the message. Like the picture in the room. Nice bathroom in the old house.

The location of this place is very good. There are convenience stores and delicious restaurants near the subway station. The host was very kind and knew a lot of information about Shanghai. While I was in Shanghai, I had fun and good memories.

I used this place twice in a short time. I think it is an independent, clean and comfortable space. I think it is well worth recommending to those traveling to Shanghai. The host is very kind.
Nice and friendly place to stay!

I recommend Ricky__ place to Young folks who want to experience modern mixes with old Shanghai and rich night life.

1. Great location, probably the best neighborhood in Shanghai. Top bars like Speck Low are right outside. Easy to access metro and buses if you take public transportation. Plenty of restaurants are available. 

2. The room is in an old Shanghai residential building. Not as fancy as the modern condos, but is a type of place that old shanghaiers live before and now. You can see the locals dry their blankets out from the windows when is sunny. Lol. The room is not very big but it got bed, closet and private bathroom. What__ else do you need?

3. Ricky is a very welcoming and friendly. He send me the map and direction from metro train station to his place and introduced us the neighborhood with some good places to go. He responds very quickly as well.
This is a clean and comfortable room. Its location is perfect, with the atmosphere of traditional Shanghai life in the community. Ricky is a very nice guy. Thanks!
Great location, walking distance to cafes & restaurants. A close experience to Shanghai__ neighbourhoods.
Very warm and neat place, thanks for having me to stay in your place, I had a wonderful vacation in Shanghai.

You will enjoy a good time if you plan to rent Ricky's apartment. He will give you a warm welcome, at the same time keep a comfortable distance with you during your stay. But don't worry you could always ask him if you need any help. 

You could share nearly all the space and appliances in the apartment, for me I really like his big cozy living room with such a high ceiling height. But the moisture in the bedroom could be higher than your expectation, remember to open AC and switch to moisture mode for couple hours before sleep. 

Well, the apartment is nice, but try to hang around the surroundings, there are countless places you could spend your time.

Highly recommend this place. Ricky is such a nice guy give me a warm welcome. The room is quite tidy and clean. The room is located in the heart of Shanghai. It can provides of the local experience of Shanghai.

I really recommend Ricky__ place, nice and quite location, the appartement and the room are really clean. The bed comfortable and the enclosed bathroom very convenient.

The apartement is very clean and very close to metro. You can find a lot of good and cheap restaurants near by. I will come back  there again next time. Highly recommanded.
Very convinient as walking distance to metro undergound and mall and shops. Good for bagpackers who wanted to explore shanghai.

Convenient location with good restaurants, grocery stores and pharmacy nearby. The apartment is clean and bright. The kitchen is fully furnished with necessary appliances.  The overall experience is very pleasant.

Everything was fine.

Really clean and same as look in the photo. The host is really kind and helped me a lot also for a few informations about Shanghai.

Nice!the room was very clean and spacious!

Really a great stay. Hosts were very helpful and they shared lots of amazing restaurants with us. This apartment is very clean and cozy. Highly recommended!

There is two supermarkets 2 minutes walk from the flat. Subway line 1 is 20 minutes  away by foot. The residential building is really quiet.

Very handy little apartment in a good location. There is a brand new supermarket next door that has everything you need. The washer/dryer is also very handy if you are staying for a few days. I would definitely stay here again.

Good location, easy to find. Thoughtful services and prompt response!

It was a great experience staying at Yujie__ place. The location is great. The host responded to our questions immediately which made the trip a lot easier.

Spent 3 lovely nights at Yujie's place. The apartment is located in central Shanghai with easy access everywhere via metro / bus. The room was clean with several personal touches that really made it feel comfortable. The washer was a huge bonus :) Overall, I really enjoyed the stay!
Yujie's place is fantastic _ clean, stylish, and well located. I also cannot thank her enough for her great hospitality.
great unit but hard bed. this is common for China.

Excellent place, great view from the balcony, clean and super close to the metro line 4.

The apartment is exactly as pictured: airy, pretty, with a lovely view. Communication with the hosts was easy. It is well located, just a 1-minute walk away from Pudian (Line 4 and 6); once on the metro, you__e rarely more than half an hour away from major tourist attractions within the city. My only quibble is that the apartment, while located off a busy street, is in a run-down apartment complex that is poorly lit and feels unsafe. The lifts are old and slow and the corridors devoid of people, and the lobby looks rather like a warehouse. This is no fault of Lindsay__ own, and the AirBNB is great, but solo female travelers like myself might feel uncomfortable if you are concerned about safety. Then again, as long as you__e reasonably aware of your surroundings, I don__ see why that should stop you from booking this place! There__ also a Family Mart near by which makes it easy to stock up on snacks.

Lindsay's apartment is very well located and just some few steps from Fujian Road (line 4). 
The neighborhood is quite and close to business buildings at the heart of Pudong area. Just some blocks to find good restaurants and services !
Lindsay were also very helpful to attend one of my sudden demand. Her assistance was perfect !
Second time in Lindsay's apartment, and always very nice experience.

It is really a nice clean place. The location is very excellent nearby subway and supermarket store.

Rein's place is perfect for four people. More than enough room, with a kitchen, bathroom, living room, and laundry room. Rein was very easy to contact, and was quick to reply all questions I had. Location is perfect, 5 minute walk from Line 10 (Shui Cheng Station). The location is awsome, it has lots of restaurants just near by. And also the apartment was clean and the light was soooo good.

It was a poor experience.  When we entered the apartment, there was a stench in the air.  Maybe the previous occupants were smoking or the windows were not opened for a while.    The smell stayed throughout our 12 days stay.  I had to take out the filters from the air-con to wash them and still it did not helped much.
The furnitures are old and used, curtains are stuck, floor looks dirty and the worst of all is the extremely slow WIFI.  
The location is good, with many restaurants, supermarkets nearby but the owner seriously need to do something about the apartment before they list it again.

Rein was very helpful  and Gubei is a nice area (with a carrefour within walking distance).  
...but the apartment was quite dirty and cockroaches were an issue.

I__l start by saying that we liked the location because it was close to the places we were going to. Communication with the host was also easy. However those were the only good things I can say.  The house isn__ as clean as I expected it to me and having stayed at a few other Airbnbs in the same area, my expectations are not that high. The cleaning service did not do a thorough, leaving dust balls in the common areas and bedroom. The bathroom is really rundown with a loose tap, dead centipede (I have pictures) and yellowish water (I have pictures). There were also mozzies in the house when we arrived but eventually went away because the house was equipped with plug-in repellents. It is too close to the ground floor - noise from the restaurants and bars downstairs can be a nuisance up till midnight. Also, when the restaurant is busy, kitchen fumes enter the kitchen in the unit, smoking it out (I have pictures). Lastly, I would say that if you are staying with friends or just your partner, it might be less critical. But we brought along our 3 yo daughter and found the above conditions very unreasonable. I have made my feedback to the host prior to writing this.

Ronnie __ room is very nice and spacial place, when you stay in the room every is really perfect stay. Only 5 min walk to Longyang Station where is the big hub of all transportation in Pudong Area, 15 min walk to SINEC. The room is very big and beautiful as same as the photo.

Great stay at Lulu's place. Very strong attention to all details in the design and cleanliness of this place. Perfect for getting anywhere in Pudong or Jingan. Enjoy!

This apartment can accommodate up to 8 adults with 4 rooms. It is within a few minutes walking distance (about 200-300m) from Long Yang Station (the Maglev train from Pudong Airport terminates here). Traveling around Shanghai is convenient from this location via the metro train services. There is a supermarket just across the road (about 100m away) and a small mall where the metro station is located. The apartment's design is modern contemporary and beds are comfortable. The access into the lift lobby on the ground floor has RFID access control and the gate to the lift lobby may be closed in the night. Best to ask the host where to get the RFID tag to enter the lift lobby when arriving late at night. All rooms have air-conditioning and heaters. We enjoyed our short stay here.

We stayed for 4 nights. The apartment is in a residential estate. The building itself is a bit dated. The apartment is spacious with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms as described. There are air conditionings in every bedroom and the sitting room. The bathrooms are heated by ceiling mounted heaters. It was cold in Shanghai while we were there so we had to keep the air conditioning on while we were in. This unfortunately overloaded the fuse box and power was cut off twice, one of which occasions we had to wait for the engineer to come to fix it. The host however was very responsive and helpful in that occasion. The power problem was fixed within an hour. The location is good for taking the public transport but not very convenient for eating out - though it is close to the metro there are very limited eateries around, perhaps because it is in a residential area. It takes about 30 minutes to get to the centre of Shanghai (Nanjing Road, the Bund, Xintiandi etc.) but very convenient for Pudong International airport, with the Maglev and the metro stations 3 minutes away. Being in an old building the hot water is heated by direct gas heater, which is temperamental - it is not easy to keep the water temperature stable. We didn__ cook but there are plenty of pots, pans, plates, glasses and cups should one want to. The internet is fast and reliable.

Stephane__ home is exactly as pictured. In over 4 years in China, it is the nicest Airbnb I have stayed in and among the nicest apartments I__e seen. The location is perfect, close to the French Concession, easily accessible by subway, and across the street from a delightful French bakery. Staying at Stephane__ truly felt like being at home__omfortably, sunny, and warm. 

A few things to note, post-shower the apartment can smell a bit mildewy. This is typical for China and especially Shanghai, but do take note. As Stephane mentions, the apartment doors close at 9:30pm, so you will be entering via a garage. Lastly, Stephane__ home is generously stocked, however, we weren__ sure what was his or for his guests_ use...we erred on the side of caution!

All in all, a great stay! I will definitely book again the next time I am in SH. Thanks Stephane!

Great experience living in this apartment. 

Parents visited me and husband on weekend in SH. I spared time to browse and select it on Airbnb since good location, decoration style and piano to spoil parents.

My colleague and I had a short trip in Shanghai. We decided to stay in Stephane__ two bed room flat. The decision was absolutely right. The flat sits on the 17th floor. You can enjoy a great view from different rooms. We had two-separate rooms, one is en-suit and the other can access a shared bathroom. Both rooms are clean, comfy and functional. The living room is spacious and pleasant. It really makes feel like living home. The location is great, surrounded by some nice restaurants and shops. There is a very nice French patisserie across the street. We had a nice breakfast and afternoon tea there. Stephane is a great host. Very quick to respond and being thoughtful. We will definitely recommend his flat to other friends and come back again next time.

After seeing the pictures of the apartment, we were ready to pay the price to have a pleasant stay.
Shaolei was very accommodating for everything, whether it was organizing our arrival or the requests we had on site, he was very responsive every time.
However, the apartment was very far from the standard and at the same level as the price we had paid.
The toilets were clogged regularly. Water was running in the bathroom when we took our shower, the host knew because he had left a wiper blade on the spot.
The nights were no better, the neighbors on the other side were doing their washing machine (sometimes at 3am!) and doing some conversation, and as it wasn't well isolated we could hear everything!
I have some other points that I will not address, otherwise my comment would be very long.
I don't understand such a price.
A good point though, the apartment is located in a typical Shanghai neighborhood (Shikumen), we really liked its location.

Apartment as in the pictures. Nice and clean! A bit small but enough for a weekend trip in Shanghai! It is very central and communication with the host was excellent!

The property is clean, has everything you'd need so if you want somewhere reasonable which gives you easy access to the city the recommended :)
Superb location. Host was quick to respond. Space was on the smaller side but still accommodates two full/queen beds

Great location with 3 different metro stations nearby. I would recommend the apartment for 1-2 people maximum, as it is really small, but totally fine for a weekend. Nice clean bathroom with all you need. Kitchen equipped with a kettle, some glasses, frying pan (and maybe more). Wi-Fi working fine. The only issue was that is could be cleaner - we found some dirt on the kitchen floor, under beds, some dust around etc. All in all not a bad experience if you are looking for a cheap place to sleep in a good location.
great location!Everything went very well of my business trip to Shanghai this time. And it__ a good decision to stayed in this cozy little room.
Overall a great experience! The place is really nice and cozy, very clean! Loved the neighborhood as well!

Wish the hot water tank(water heater) was faster. We had to wait for showers between each person.

very good apartment with pretty distinctive decoration. The location is a little far away from the center but on the contrary very quiet. Like the place.

You can expect to have a pleasant experience. It is located in an active area where you can always find something to eat, drink, explore and buy. The alley the apartment is in is lined with flowers and plants. The apartment has several healthy plants giving it a homey cozy feel.

This is the best location I can ever ask for in Shanghai, literally 3 minutes from Xintiandi subway and right in the heart of the Xintiandi area. Eleven gave wonderfully descriptive directions to the house, which is tucked in a relatively quiet nongtang community, showcasing the best of old and new Shanghai. Loved my stay and would definitely book again for my next trip to Shanghai!
It__ a great place for sightseeing, near a big shopping centre and it__ easy to access to the metro station. The house is significant clean and stylish . Very recommend
The location is amazing, easy access to cafes and subway. The host was very helpful. Recommended!!

Best location in Shanghai. in the heart of xintiandi and 5min walk to metro station. the place is very stylish. would definitely stay her3 again.
Great location near XTD metro station. Cosy interior with full amenities. Very clean. Enjoyed living in this loft in Shanghai :)
This place is stylish and comfortable with everything you needed. It is at a perfect location, very easy to get around and walking distance to K11, some awesome cafes and bars.
Amazing location, incredible neighborhood, steps from the metro. Eleven went above and beyond and was able to be reached with any questions. Can__ recommend enough! Wonderful!

Eleven was a very communicative, warm and quick responding host which was extremely appreciated. The location was great with close proximity to multiple metro lines. I unfortunately found the space itself to be largely non-functional though and would not stay again. Some helpful information to others who do stay: (1) Note, there are two keypads for the door. The obvious one with visible numbers is not correct. The correct one looks like a finger scanner and you must touch it to activate numerical input. (2) The listing says you can cook in, but all of the kitchen cabinets are filled with either a large ventilation hose or cleaning / host supplies apart from one with a stack of dishes. I did not feel the kitchen was truly food preparation friendly at all and for me this is important. Plan to buy necessary tools  (3) The closet upstairs is quite large, but the doors cannot accessibly open because there is not enough space between the bed. Even if you akwardly pushed the bed all the way to the opposite wall blocking the stairs, you would still need to access the closet on your knees as the ceiling is low. Was stuck in my suitcase for a week (4) There is no table to comfortably work with a laptop on for business travelers (5) China requires Airbnb guests to register with the local police station within 24 hours of arrival, something the house guide does not mention. Though this seems quite lax, fine or other issue upon exit was not something I was interested in risking. The police station Eleven referred me to insisted I had to register at another office and this turned into a weeklong bounce between difficult to find stations all pointing at each other. Friend's staying in other Shanghai Airbnb's experienced the host completely taking care of registration for them with a copy of their passport. Perhaps a note of convenience to consider.
Thanks Eleven for being a fantastic host. We loved our stay in your apartment. Fantastic location next to Xintiandi.
great host and great place to stay. fantastic location and stylish place.

The location of the accommodation was close to the subway and it was good to play. 

A system where towels are replaced after payment, not once a day.

Turn off the lights and cockroaches come out. If you're scared, turn on the lights when you go out

Me and my boyfriend stayed in Eleven's Apartment for 5 nights and it was great! The place is located perfectly and is one of the cooler neighborhoods, I think. 

The place was clean and stylish but not super practical. The bedroom is located upstairs and the closet too. The ceiling is pretty low and you have to get used to not hit your head in the morning. We just kept our clothes downstairs in our luggage, which was a bit unpractical. 

We stayed in december so it was quite chilly in the room downstairs, even though we had a heater. Also good to know: The kitchen / bathroom part is not isolated so it was pretty chilly to have a shower. 

Unless that, i really enjoyed the stay and eleven was really helpfull with everything and replied fast. 

Thank you!

Had a late flight, realized that too late myself. Reached out to Lydia & she helped me to store my bags for half a day free of charge. She responds quickly & is very hospitable.

Great place to stay.

I really enjoyed staying at this apartment, and would recommend it to anyone who wants a cheap and nice place in Shanghai, and who don't mind walking a few blocks to the subway. The room was beautiful and well-decorated with a fantastic view of the Shanghai skyline. Lydia was kind and courteous and provided extra amenities like toothbrushes, towels, and snacks. I also appreciated having access to a fridge, stove, kettle and microwave. My only complaints were that the rest of the building was not as nice as the room itself, and I felt a little uneasy walking into the parking lot or around the small streets at night. Seems like an ideal place for couples.

Lydia was an amazing host. She was in constant communication before arrival. I unfortunately came just before the typhoon and was shut in the apartment for two days. Lydia contacted me to make sure I had arrived safely, and offered to call a taxi if needed. I loved having the kitchen while I was staying out of the rain. The place is in a convenient location for walking to the subways (8/12 minutes depending on the subway line). There are plenty of convenience stores in the vicinity which makes grabbing water and snacks easy. The view is amazing! The washer was a plus since I got very hot and sweaty. I was alone, but was always escorted back to the apartment. I cannot to the safety at night, however, I always felt very safe when walking about other parts of the day. There are usually many people out on the streets at night, so I wouldn__ have been too worried if was not escorted. At the end of my trip, my bank card stopped working, and I didn__ have enough money to make it to the airport. Lydia was kind enough to help arrange a car to take me, which I was able to pay later through Airbnb. She went above and beyond. Initially I thought the price was a little high, but Lydia__ great hospitality and the apartment__ amenities makes it worth every penny. I would definitely stay here again!
Very cute appartement, Lydia is very helpfull and kind :-)

Amazing place! Perfect location. Lovely local area and very easy metro ride to get into the centre of Shanghai. Photos don__ do the view justice - It__ incredible! Has all the essentials and more. Very good and quick communication from the host as well. Would highly recommend.

Lydia was great! She gave clear instructions & directions with pictures for the Metro and getting from the Metro to her home. Her place was very cute and clean. She also gave great food recommendations in Shanghai. Lydia was very helpful and sweet!
Very comfortable. I will definitely stay here again.

Lydia and her apartment were the best fit i could imagine. The apartment is perfectly located at the city center and very close to bus and metro. It is cosy and there is everything you need. The stay was amazing. The apartment was phenomenal with a beautiful view of downtown Shanghai. Love the bathroom and the shower, clean and the water pressure and temperature was heaven. Lydia had also been very helpful which is definitely a huge plus for the stay. She even asked the cleaning lady to finish early so that we could check in earlier. Thanks so much for everything.

Host is very nice and the apartment is very clean and quiet. Even the building is not new  . The decoration is very nice. The transportation is also very convenient. 7 min from home to the metro (Website hidden by Airbnb) family really enjoy this trip and thanks for everything.

Amazing place fits us three girls for a business trip. Warm and cozy home, 3 individual rooms, a big living room allowing us to chill and work together. The community is good as well, traditional and local. Easy to commute and near good foods, big mall. I__l definitely come back again!

The apartment is very well located, about 8 minutes walk from the metro station. It is very quiet but only about 5 meters away from an intersection of two main streets where you can get everything you need. There are grocery stores, bakeries, convenience stores and plenty of food options. The area is very lively at night and felt very safe.
The apartment itself is beautifully decorated and the size was perfectly fine for four people. It is a long and narrow space divided into three sections: the kitchen with a nook (can be used for sleeping), the lounge with a futon, and a bedroom looking out into a little courtyard. 
We loved the place and had a great stay (6 nights). The only negative is that there is only one proper mattress which was in the nook where the kids slept. The main bed had a very thin mattress which made the bed extremely uncomfortable as you could feel every single bed slate on your body. We had to drag the mattress from the futon (also very thin) and used one of the duvets underneath to make it better. 
Besides that, no complaints and would definitively stay back in the apartment if the bed issue was resolved.

The apartment looks exactly like on the pictures and is perfectly suitable for four people. This is my favorite Air bnb I__e stayed in. The villa is elegantly decorated with each room having different styles. The book room was great, next time I want to try the goddess room :) If you__e looking for a safe, peaceful, and beautiful retreat from the city__ stresses and cramped quarters, this is perfect. The newly built community is securely guarded and well-maintained. The host family was so warm and helpful__ didn__ want to leave them! They have an amazing music room with several instruments, a projection screen, and even a karaoke machine. They keep beer, water, and many other things you might need right downstairs. Super clean. One thing to consider is the location__t__ removed from the downtown area, but that is what makes it so nice and quiet. I took cabs into town when I needed to for around $13 USD/70-100RMB each way.

The place was great! The parental suite was impressive and allowed the family that we stayed with to have a perfect space to live. It__ beautifully decorated and nicely organized. Every room had to own specialty and we really enjoyed exploring the place. The host was really helpful and was always willing to answer questions! Thanks for letting us stay! Would definitely return in the future if the opportunity ever arises.

This is a wonderful place for those seeking a breather away from the city. It__ pretty near to Disneyland by car (public transport not so.) The place is located at the heart of Shanghai. Therefore, it__ easy to access ANYTHING you want. Convenient store at night, shopping malls, banks, luxury goods, local restaurants, bars_ you name it. Transportation is wonderful, subway is just next by and stoping a taxi / calling a Didi (the Chinese Uber / Lyft) is easy.

The place is fully furnished and come with everything you need. All you need is just to bring yourself and your friend(s). The house is the old style townhouse. Neighborhood is very quiet but it__ not a smart choice to make some noice. Rooms are stylish and yes, the master room is VERY BIG so I like it a lot. The house come with a lots of comfortable towels, that__ the most surprising things I__e make note.

Communication with the host is wonderful. Alu is a lady who like to share her experiences and answer your questions if you needed. She__ easy going so don__ hesitate to ask her anything. Having the Chinese APP _ (Hidden by Airbnb) _ will make your life much easier here. Not only communicate with Chinese but also doing payments and even calling Didi, the Chinese Uber/Lyft.

I do recommend you to book at this place.Especially for anyone who is looking for a casual trip to know more about Shanghai and prefer to live with locals. Instead of staying in hotel, this place provide great convince, at the same time it has everything ourselves need.
The host was absolutely easy to communicate with, at the same time the accomodation was convenient for public transport, nice food around.

Pretty cool place in a historic urban area. A bit hard to locate but not too bad. Was expecting the entire place but only get one large bedroom unless pay more after already made the payment, bit unclear. But overall a good stay. Love the decoration.

Very thoughtful and beautifully decorated space. It is the top floor of a traditional Shanghainese building, furnished with high quality electronics and amenities. The location is also very close to the bar/restaurant district in Shanghai.

If you__e looking to get a sense of traditional Shanghai living quarters with a modern twist, this is the space for you.

This is a wonderful place in the middle of a peaceful historic villa at the heart of Shanghai. Right off West Nanjing Road, near the metro station and tons of food and shopping. Check-in can be tricky for foreigners but the host is very responsive and communicative -- just ask questions (and get (Hidden by Airbnb) on your phone)! It's a quiet place with older neighbors and is not a place to make noise. But if you're looking to get a real feel for Shanghai life without sacrificing convenience and location it's hard to beat. Recommended.

Pros: Great location, very clean and homely touches. 
Cons: Keys located in locked box in separate location making check-in confusing. Not sure if we caught the host on a bad day, but pretty impatient and abrupt on the phone.
Same as pictured. Great location steps always from metro stations. Love the historical ambiance of the space. You get to see how the locals live their life in Shanghai.
Thank you for having me such a wonderful place. It was really nice experience to become like a local.

Place is very stylish, and super super clean! The place is in downtown shanghai, there are tons of good coffee shops and restaurants  nearby -- can't beat the location. Yet the apartment is located in a very quiet/old/typical shanghai neighborhood, a perfect way to experience traditional/classic shanghai lifestyle.
Like the way how the host worked the decorations and furnitures (Website hidden by Airbnb) was a great and unforgettable experience to stay here:)
It is a very nice house,  I was very exciting to live and got a great experience.
The place is very stylish, and clean. Very nice, convenient location. Enjoyed my stay here

The apartment is great. It has an awesome retro vibe and it has everything you need. It__ in a classic neighborhood in Shanghai and you__e surrounded by friendly locals which makes you feel a less touristy vibe. 
I would definitely recommend this stay.

This was my second time staying in this airbnb, and the visit of foreign friends made me choose it again. Beautiful and quiet downtown villa, as for the friends of the unanimous praise.
Perfect location ,room is clean and comfy ,best easy hking host ever . Would love to stay again :)

Clean and cozy, a high cost-efficient option in the very central location of Shanghai. The households are also very welcoming and thoughtful. Highly recommended :)

However, please do notes a few things before making a reservation: 

1. The underground station was about 10-minute walk from the house instead of 3 minutes in the description.

2. It could be quite warm during summer despite the electric fan.
Very good location and host! Yoyo_ Lavin äººé_å¾_¥½,_¨è_å¤§å_¥ä_!
Had a very great time! Thank you so much
The place is bigger than I expected, cute and very comfortable for one person. The location was gold. Seesaw coffee was also delicious.
Apartment in central area, cozy room but must clean all the common parts well. Nice Host.
Very relaxing stay. I loved Lavin and Yoyo__ cozy space! Bagel is sooo cute!

By the time I landed to Shanghai at 11:30pm, I tried calling one of the hosts and nobody was answering. I figured out they were already sleeping. (Take note: I confirmed with them and they said they will be at home waiting for me) I booked them because they are labeled as 'superhost', but unfortunately I didn't have a great experience. My first night -  I had to look for a hotel last-minute and it brought so much trouble because some hotel doesn't accept foreigners. 2nd -  it says "private condominium", so my impression was a modern high-rise with an elevator. But it's an old walk-up building. 3rd - there's a construction at the time I was there so treat this as your alarm clock - you'll be awaken by 7am drilling, shouting and banging of doors from neighbors. The location is 15-minute walk to the Jing'an train station Line 2, so not really that super convenient, although the area is very residential.  Hosts are nice though. No fridge, microwave and kitchen is tiny.

Amazing little cute room, very nice hosts, extremely friendly and accommodating. Very helpful. 

The location is super convenient and central. 

I would recommend this room for anyone wanting to enjoy the night life or even get a good coffee experience in Shanghai downtown.

Look forward to visiting this place again . Highly recommend!

The hosts are super nice. Bagel is sooo cute! The location is great too, 10-min walk from the metro. Had a wonderful time at Lavin and Yoyo__ place.

Such a great place to stay - - the location is extremely central and easy to get around, the hosts are very welcoming, as well as their little Bagel. The steps are not that difficult to climb up after the first day.

Great location! Easy access to multiple buses and in between two metro stations. Family mart nearby. 

Room was bigger than I thought and was very warm and cozy in winter. 

Great value and Bagel is friendly and cute!

The appartment is having an amazing view. It's clean and very close to Subway and turistic places. We were received very kind by people around. Everybody was nice. Our host was taking care of us all the time, and her English is very good.
The apartment is nice. Very good location. The owner replied to all my questions fast

Nice villa and nice location near Pudong international airport for around 15mins driving distance. And next to Disney as well. The host and her family and thire dog is lovely. I do appreciate that they pick me up at 12 midnight.
Muy buen lugar si requieres algo centrico y cercano al aereopuerto,

Great stay! Picked me up from the airport, nice big and clean house, let me leave my bags there while I explored Shanghai for a few hours, dropped me of at the subway, then dropped me off again after I returned for my bags. I would definitely recommend for anyone in Shanghai.
è¶_º§_______å§__å®_!_¥é__è´´å_,_¿é_è¶_¹²_,__æ£__ä¸æ¬¡ä_å®!Amazing host and convenient to airport!! Highly recommend!
Really welcoming host! Good location. Good heater. Not bad decoration. A really good choice!

Decent stay. Pros: large room, nice hosts who brought me a snack, and bottled water provided. Cons: caution if visiting in the winter - while the bedroom has a heater which works well, the bathroom does not and it was frigid cold in there, hard bed (although this is pretty common in China), and very difficult house to find (host offers pickup from the airport, you should DEFINITELY accept this offer if you stay here, the taxi was a nightmare and I only eventually found the place with the help of some strangers). Overall, I recommend for a quick stay in Shanghai, ideally during more seasonable weather.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The uncle was very thoughtful and helpful .

It has been an amazing time staying at Gefii__ place. It is conveniently-located, just 8-minute walk from Jing__n Temple Subway station and there is a bus stop just outside the apartment complex headed to the bund.
This apartment is ideal location for walking (or grab a bike )to explore the city. Restaurants, cafes, markets, etc_are all convenient nearby.
The apartment is well functional, really comfy, enough for 4 of us, the room is clean and comfortable, they have everything I need, exactly match what the photo present.
Gefii and his family also very responsive to answer all my question about the apartment and the getting around. They are very friendly and helpful for me to explore shanghai with my family.
We will definitely recommend Gefii__ place to other travelers and will stay at theirs again in the future.

I was able to stay at Gefii's loft house a couple days back between July 19 and 21st, and I was very impressed by how much detail the host has put together. 

First of all, it is not just Gefii, but an entire team working on hosting this pretty house for ya. I had about six members contacted me and offered me all kinds of help: from basic routines like check-in, confirmation transportation, frequent check to detailed things like local food recommendations and local tourist place recommendations, anything you can imagine, they are there to help. You will see both the Chinese and the English version of the document and the helpful tips they shared, so this place is definitely foreign and local travelers friendly. 
Besides communication, I cannot help but need to mention how great the location is in the city (a good walk from two subway stations on line 2, a 5-mins walk to Jing An Temple and shopping mall, at least 3 convenient stores within 5 mins walking distance, and many local tea, coffee, snacks shops) and the cute house they just remodeled. The house has more than what they posted on Airbnb, a stair to the second floor cute bedroom (though it can be a little bit hot in the summer from time to time due to skylights), there is really nothing to complain about. No matter where you are from, you will like the cute and friendly design and the toilet (oh yes, important). You can spend your time as a local Shanghainese in a mood for some house cooking, or simply as a traveler for some local takeout or restaurant dine-in. Very convenient for sure.  Great job Gefii's team, I am sure you won't let others down. If you want to experience traditional Shanghainese community, stay here. If you want to experience a new and neat modern house, stay here as well. Because you will get both.

Gefii__ space is amazing, the design is remarkable, everything in the room is new and clean, hope one day i can have a loft like this, maybe i will ask Gefii design for me, haha. Communication with them were great, we add the social app each other, they send me really clear map for how to find the apt easily and super useful recommendation they made, Extremely helpful and relax. I will definitely to say yes for my next stay in shanghai.
