Tijdens mijn verblijf in Shanghai samen met mijn vriend verbleven we in deze airbnb. Het viel ons meteen op hoe modern de inrichting was en hoe er een erg ruime en lichte sfeer was. Alle kamers zijn erg verzorgd afgewerkt en zeer proper.  In de kamer was alles wat we nodig hadden aanwezig. Er was een klein probleem met het slot van de slaapkamer maar we konden de eigenaar meteen contacteren waardoor er onmiddelijk iemand gestuurd werd om het probleem op te lossen. De ligging van de airbnb is erg goed. Het ligt namelijk in een zijstraatje van een iets grotere straat waar je verschillende lokale restaurantjes vind. Zich verder verplaatsen vanaf deze locatie m.b.v. een taxi of de metro ging ook erg makkelijk. Met andere woorden het is zeker een aanrader voor iedereen die Shanghai wilt verkennen! Zelf willen wij zeker nog eens hier verblijven tijdens onze volgende trip in China.

My boyfriend and I stayed at this Airbnb during our trip in Shanghai. When arriving we immediately noticed how modern, light and spacious it was. All of the rooms were very clean and everything we needed was available. During our stay we got one small issue with the lock of the bedroom door, however immediately someone was send to fix it. The location of the Airbnb is also great, the neighbourhood in which it__ located is full of local restaurants and shops. It__ also very easy to use public transportation e.g. taxis or metro to get to the other places you would like to visit. I highly recommend this Airbnb to anyone who would like to discover Shanghai! We surely want to stay at this Airbnb a second time when we visit Shanghai again.

It was a nice experience to stay at Gefii's place. My family four enjoyed Shanghai and the house very much. The location is the best, since it is a walkable distance to the shopping mall clutter W. Nanjing Rd and metro line 2 stations. 
Geffi and his team are easy to communicate. Geffi brought an extra fan to us when we told him that the loft was warm. We managed to cool it down, and the temperature is not a problem. They are also warmhearted. They forgot the third and fourth towels, but Gefii handed them to us in the typhoon at 11 pm on the first night.
The house is clean and cozy. There is no bed frame on the loft, but the mattress itself is okay to me. It is recently furbished. The small private garden is a nice place to watch some twilight clouds. The neighborhood is quiet as well.

Gefii and partner Grace are available at all times and try to provide support on any inquiry.

The place is mostly likely suitable for a family of 4, 2 adults and 2 kids. 

Location is quite central and convenient to access public transportation and move around major spots in town.

We had a great stay at Gefii's place in Shanghai. From the point of booking until our departure, he and his family made sure our time in Shanghai and at their loft would be as comfortable as possible. We were given detailed transportation and check-in instructions well in advance and received plenty of culinary, cultural and touristic recommendations to spend our time. The group was always  responsive to enquiries and easy to communicate with. 
The loft was spotless upon arrival and exactly matched its description. It's located in one of the city's most entertaining and central districts and is a short 5 minute walk from Jing'an Temple metro station.  
We recommend Gefii's property to anyone visiting Shanghai.
Nice place! Good location to see jingan temple and travel through subway. Love the adorable decoration in house!
Amazing travel experience. Convenient place easy to find; well-organized apartment and very kind & thoughtful host! :)
Place is really clean and very nicely kept. Entrance of the place gave it a lot of privacy. The neighbourhood had a security at the gate which was a nice addition. Would stay again!

Gefii and his co hosts were great. My family of 4 stayed here for 2 months, and the home was perfect size. The location is AWESOME. It__ about a 10 minute walk or so to the line 2 metro. There__ plenty of places to eat/shop within a quick walk. The community is very quiet pretty much all day and night. And lastly, the hosts are very quick to respond! If I had any issues or questions, I had a response in less than 10 minutes. Thank you so much for your excellent hospitality!

Gefii__ house is nice. If you would like to a local experience in shanghai, I strongly recommend it. There is a nice noodle shop just around corner and the nearest subway satiation is located 3mins by walk.

This location is in an excellent area and the house really suits anyone visiting Shanghai with a lighter luggage load. There were a few issues with cleanliness, a wasps nest, and roof leakage. However, the hosts were very responsive and helpful and addressed all the above issues promptly. Thanks to them, any future renter will likely not have any of the problems above.
Perfect apartment. Perfect view. Perfect location.  Value for money.

Good location for easy accesses but not too convenient if you come in from airport. Should ask for the IC card for easy entering for  the main entrance of the building
His place was amazing! The bed was super big and comfortable and the area was really clean and tidy.

It was such a lovely little old house, it__ 2nd and 3rd floor we rented, so that__ enough of a private space which is not interfering with the 1st floor. The location is definitely gold, it__ right in the middle of the beautiful french concession area, lots of historical houses around. Best weekend getaway! The house is old so the shower is not so powerful, and you gotta walk up the floors, but that didn__ really bother us, we were expecting it. It is a bit noisy because you hear your neighbours shouting in the early morning, that__ actually quite funny since they were shouting in shanghainese, and it makes me feel like in the movie lol... The host responded to our questions very fast! I would recommend this place for any weekenders, or short trip in Shanghai!
Very stylish space with thoughtful decoration, we liked very much.

like staying at home, full of things what you really need
A very nice flat, with everything you need. It feels like home!
Tom's place is nice, clean and close to public transportation. Good place to stay if you don't have mobility problems as the apartment is on the 6th floor and there is no elevator.
Amazing place to stay, had a great time. Lovely host as well.
Nice place for a group. The apt has 5 rooms and 5 beds. The location was by far one of the best for anyone visiting SNIEC for business reasons. The host was kind and fast in responses.

The apartment is spacious, bright and clean. The host was super fast with communication and helpful. Everything we needed to use in the apartment was easy to find. It was in a very good location for our stay in Pudong to see friends, and there are many shops and restaurants, and 2 metro stations nearby.
This place is easy to find, conveniently located, and has the best views! The rooms all have big beds and a lot of space. 10/10 would recommend.
Unfortunately this place is quite rundown and unclean.  There are tiles broken in the showers and bathroom and they entire furnishings needs to be deep cleaned.  Location is good though.

Host responds super fast and the location is literally next to the convention center. Perfect for guests traveling for business.
Great response from landlord, apartment in a very convenient location (near metro, century park, expo). Nice property with upscale residents as neighbours.
It was my 2nd time staying here and the location is perfect. Friendly and very responsive host. I'll stay here again next month.
The best place to stay for SNIEC expos.

We were locked out from the main door on the first day which was not supposed to be closed. The host told us to fix the issue, but didn__ do anything until we checked out...not a satisfying experience :(
Except that, the room was pretty nice overall

Absolutely a nice place to stay. Great location, I will book it again if I ever come to shanghai. The host Elenevi is very kind and willing to help all the things I asked.I enjoy staying here so much! Thanks again!

This Airbnb was great! The location was prime, close to every part I wanted to be in. The room was hip, very cozy design. Overall had a great stay, only concern was on the last day of my stay, the toilet gave us some problems. Other than that, it was great! Would def stay here again for my future visits!
This place is in a great location near the plenty of restaurants & shops.The room is big,all new,clean and comfortable.Enjoyed our stay & I will be back!
Great place, very clean and great location.. host was very prompt with communication and very accommodating for our stay!

Good location.  Just happened to run out of power and water supply for the last night when I get back late.  Elenevi tried to help and eventually got power in the morning and water right before I need to go
This place if really nice and comfortable and is in a pretty nice neighborhood. I would highly recommend this place if you come and visit Shanghai.
Lovely place with interesting books and nice decor. I would definitely stay here again! :)

book on other platform for the same bed with cheaper price . Airbnb offer a price which is much higher that others. The price is 120yuan p.p on Airbnb while at the same time it is only 80 yuan p.p on other platform. I don__ see the point.

The stay was wonderful, very smooth check in process, owner is very friendly and caring. Location is awesome as it is close to train station 'North ZhongShan Road' and link to every tourist side with one or two line transit. Also, the room is sparkling clean and public area was cozy. Overall, me and my friend truly enjoy the stay in _·å_'s place.
Nice people, nice stay, thanks for your quick responses all the time

The location is convenient and easy to find as Jiang provide details beforehand. Amenities are sufficient and nice. The most important thing is that Jiang offered help in time. And the room look just the same as the photo!
Nice host, great price, good location and easy access to nearby restaurants. Inner decoration is clean and thoughtful.

Brand new apartment with cute decorations. Huge comfy bed with great beamer for home theater. The xiao mi home machine was fun to play with. Awesome view with lots of greens around. Peaceful and quite environment, easily accessible by metro and lots of shops just downstairs. Highly recommended if you want to get out of the hustling and bustling life of central Shanghai. Perhaps unfit for foreigners as there are guards coming to check who's staying in the apartment and registering your passport info...
Quiet area and if I would have work around that area I would book this place again
Really enjoyed staying at the accommodation! Cosy bed with a curtain to keep it private, there was plenty of space for storage. Would stay there again!

I enjoyed my time here very much. It pretty much is very no nonsense and straight fwd. The place doesnt have a typical __outh hostel_ vibe at all, which I prefer. The hostel definitely caters to a more Chinese speaking traveler. Most of the other guests were people from all over China visiting Shanghai, in town for work, or people who actually live in Shanghai who are in between apartments for whatever reason. Super laidback, and great selection of foreign beers!

Amazing hostel! Bed have shelves, privacy curtain, a safe under the bed the your room key opens, and a little fold out table to do some work or read. The showers were free and great temperatures. It was a very welcoming place and easy to navigate. Most things were a 20 min drive away so it was very convenient.
Actually, the best hostel in Shanghai
The best value for you stay in Shanghai, its only few minutes walk to Jing An temple. Ms Joy is very helpful. from helping carry my luggage and calling for a taxi.
good location,  they have some hand made beer outside the hostel.  the room is normal

The host gave us an address to tell taxi, which estimate 20 RMB from Hongqiao Airport but when taxi run to 40 RMB, and I saw on airbnb maps it was the wrong way. And when I show the airbnb address we have to turn around, not yet finish, taxi driver told me it was 2 different addresses. Then I asked driver to call host and the host advised to bring us to his mentioned address. It's cause double cost of taxi which was 82RMB (see taxi bill photo). When we arrive building, no one welcome. That's okie but cannot access building without key. I asked Ringo and he told me let wait somebody in/out then we can follow. What a pity of shame! Entering the room, settle down all luggages and found out it was not same house that we paid. I messaged to Ringo to this issue but he answered let him check because he was driving and no-more respond from him. I found on Ringo profile that he has some houses in Shanghai and he just arranged us in the other house, cheaper and more far away compare to the house we paid. The house where we stayed is not bad, but it was not what we paid and expected.

I really want to give this place a good review, but there were many small problems that added up to just an average experience. To their credit, the hosts responded in a timely matter to all my requests. First, when I moved in, the place was quite dirty, and even after a visit from the cleaning lady, the stovetop and kitchen appliances had food and grease stains. The refrigerator, which is too small for a longer-term visit, looked like it hadn't been cleaned in months. I had to do that myself. The soundproofing was lacking, so the construction (which is everywhere in Shanghai) would wake me up every morning. My main complaint, however, is with the value. The property is essentially a studio, not a one bedroom apartment; that said, it was a comfortable size for myself. You are basically paying for the excellent location: near restaurants, minutes from the Line 1 and Line 10, essential convenience stores right downstairs. But for the size of the apartment it is quite pricey, and you can find larger apartments for much cheaper just one block away. I would say this place would be fine for a short-term visit, but not really suited for a stay of three or more weeks.
It__ a great choice for designers who visit Shanghai and looking for stay in a nice and quiet hood

P.S. If your sleep quality is not good, you might be easily wakened in the early morning at around 7:30 AM, as the floor is wooden. This is the only deficiency after my 4-night stay.

Teresa__ house is stylish and convenient. 

Inside the house you can find everything you need. It__ clean and cosy. Teresa is responsive and helpful. 

The house is less than 1 min walk to Family Mart and Metro station. Walkable to major shopping districts. 

I would stay here again when I come to Shanghai again. Highly recommended.

Best of all, wonderful location for US visa application. Take your time and enjoy a nice shanghai breakfast before walking to your application. It is a fancy experience living in one of the most old-shanghai-style communities. Finally the home style is compact but cozy with everything you need to enjoy the stay.

Teresa's place is great!  Very convenient to the MRT stop with a Family Mart just round the corner and major shops just a few hundred meters away.  The house itself was not very big but adequate for a couple of nights.  If you have two persons, it's perfect!  We had four persons plus quite a bit of luggage so found it a little cramped but still livable.  Teresa is prompt in her response but do get proper directions from her to get to the house from the MRT station if you are arriving that way.  It's actually less than a hundred meters from it but because of a misunderstanding in looking at the gate photo she sent us, we spent more than half an hour looking for her house.  The house is clean with nice appliances and a comfortable bed.  Do note that if you are staying as four persons, the second bed is actually a futon and not a proper bed as it is laid over the living area.  The bathroom came with a nice Japanese style toilet with all the push buttons and the best part for winter is a very strong heating lamp inside so that showering and using the toilet is warm and toasty.  Fluffy towels were given and we made use of the fridge and microwave which worked well.  There's a overhead projector for watching movies but unfortunately, you have to pay if you want to watch the movies.  One last thing is that the house is located on the ground floor with no sound-proofing, so do be prepared for noises from your upstairs neighbors.   If you want a convenient location, clean and comfortable house in Shanghai, this is a great place to stay!
Second time staying at Teresa's house and it's as amazing as last time. Very close to shops / metro. The house is stylish and cosy. Everything you need is there. Highly recommended.

Smart and compact space that was perfect for three travelers without too much luggage. Perfect location steps from metro. Would love to move here if not for the crazy housing price in Shanghai.

The apartment is very well decorated, the photos are accurate, it is located very close to a subway stop and there are many places to eat nearby.  It is stocked with plenty of towels and a fully stocked kitchen and washer. The manager of the Airbnb is very responsive and helpful however only in Chinese.  

It's in a charming lane house neighborhood so you will have the opportunity to live amongst locals.  Some of the neighbors include an alterations tailor (which I found very useful) and a antique shop - which I thought was really cool. It is truly a old fashioned lane house experience so expect to see a LOT of stray cats.  Also I need to be honest about a few things  _ there is ZERO closet space in the apartment so if you have a long stay this could be a problem or its just SO easy for the place to become cluttered.

You share walls with your neighbors - in both bedrooms there are windows covered by very thin cloth so you don't actually know there are windows that lead to the stairwell of the neighbors - you will hear every move they make, talking, going to the bathroom, etc - I advise to bring earplugs.

Besides those covered windows- one of the bedrooms has NO windows at (Website hidden by Airbnb) its a bit claustraphobic.

There were cockroaches.

We stayed for 2 weeks and there was no cleaning service.

The kitchen is technically outdoors but it has a glass partition to enclose it.  There is a vent over the stove that leads to the outside and while I was cooking  a stray cat literally went INTO the vent.  I'm very sorry but this freaked me out.

While this place was very "charming" for its price - I could have stayed at a VERY decent hotel. So it just depends on what you're looking for!
The common areas have to be shared with other people booking the other rooms on Airbnb.
nice stay for my 4days 3 nights working trip. close to MRT station line 13.

John is a one of a kind host that will go above and beyond for your needs. He communicates very well, is flexible and provides whatever you need. The place is nice and cosy, and located very close to the metro station Jiangning Road. Highly recommend this listing!

John can offer a couple of apartments in the area, and you__l enjoy the great location. Though the room is not the one I booked online (actually, I stayed in two different rooms, both of which were not the same as I booked), it is still acceptable to stay in the same building.

I strongly recommend this place Because it is great for Disneyland visitors or folks who want a quiet vacation. Excellent quality of service and amenity. The only drawback is the transit service from Disneyland, sometimes there is miscommunication.

I stayed in this apartment for a month and absolutely loved it! The location is very safe and convenient (a 2 minute walk from line 12 and and a 5 minute walk from line 2) to explore Shanghai. Not only are there lots of restaurants around, there__ also great street food hidden around the small streets of Shanghai. The apartment itself was very lovely designed, exactly the same as in the pictures, with a clean layout and great attention to detail such as light switches located in convenient spots. Another great addition to this apartment is Mr.Liu, the __utler,_ who is super helpful in everything! Whether it be in providing more amenities, fixing the bathroom or even retrieving the key I dropped down the drain! He is always there to help. The only thing is that if you don__ speak Chinese it__ a bit hard to communicate, but if you use a translating app or do good sign language he will try his best to help you. As for Teresa, I am not surprised why she__ a super host. She always replies almost immediately and tries to resolve your problems. I told her I was staying for a long time so needed a place to put my clothes, so she reassured me by saying she can put in a clothing rack! Also, after a few days I discovered that I could sometimes hear footsteps upstairs because I understand it__ quite an old building. She was very apologetic and even offered to change me to a new place if it was bothering me too much. In the end I loved the apartment so much I didn__ want to chafe, so we talked to the locals upstairs and Mr.Liu provided me with earplugs which pretty much solved the problem. I would definitely choose to come back here if I come back to Shanghai!
Thanks for everything! Will definitely recommend to my friends! Location is super!
It__ my first time of Airbnb and really great experience at Teresa__ airbnb. Location and interior was very gooood! And Teresa is very kind host more than anything else.
The apartment was stylish and fairly clean. The location was superb! I would definitiv recommend staying there!

Great, stylish listings with a great location. The place has everything for a comfortable stay. The host was very friendly and shared a lot of recommendations for the local food and interesting spots. Highly recommend!

Teresa's place is in a perfect location with shops, restaurants and everything you need around it. From this place easy access to Puxi subway lines. Recommended for business travel as well. It has a very cozy and warm feel with many lights.
Fantastic location and super stylish space! Communication was so easy and check in a breeze. Definitely recommend staying here

Location, apartment decor, responsive to messages quickly, ease to check-in even in foreign language was all top notch! 
You couldn__ ask for a better host, but the building this flat is in, is nothing like the flat itself. 
It__ old, very dark & dirty hallways with people__ belongings hanging from the ceiling. I wasn__ sure if the elevator would make it to the high floor. The walls are paper thin. Luckily noise doesn__ bother me, but i could hear the neighbors light coughing in the middle of the night. 
The room is like a diamond once you get in it. Again, I loved the space and the experience, but you should know that the building itself is... old.

it__ really a great experience for us 5 person to enjoy 2 days here and the local traditional apartment with the shanghainess view

I must mention that the place is small - smaller than what I imagined from seeing the pictures. It is probably best suited for solo travelers, as there simply isn't much room to put luggage. However, the bed is nice and wide so two can stay if they so wish. Despite the coziness of the apartment, I enjoyed my stay here; you can tell Rita is a thoughtful and experienced host, as amenities abound - washer (with instructions in English), fridge, plates and utensils. Everything is labeled and Rita sends a detailed check-in guide. The apartment is located in a charming, secure residential neighborhood right in the middle of the Jingan shopping district, with malls upon malls upon malls around, and plenty of restaurants. It ended up being a very comfortable, cozy stay :).
Rita Â´s apartment is very cosy and so well located (only 5 mins walking from West Nanjing Rd station)! Very well decorated and everything you need inside

The apartment is very nice, though very small. It__ in a decent location, but is 10 mins from any metro, and down a narrow path from a side alley. The apartment is through a building with uneven flooring and clutter on either side, up a flight of stairs, and everything is pitch-black at night, requiring a flashlight. The host can work with English speakers but communication was difficult at times. All in all despite these, the price was low and had great value.

Good location, 5 mins walk to east nanjing road station and near plenty of luxury shops. A 20 min walk to the trendy area of Shanghai Xiantandi. 

The place is very small, was comfortable for one person and maybe good for two ppl who don__ mind being very close. The only other note is the bathroom _ toilet and shower are together, which may seem strange to some western guests but for those who have travelled Asia they will be used to it.

The inside is tiny but clean and functional. However, I don't recommend to live here for a girl alone. The neighborhood is the old style of Shanghai, quite messy and very dark at night. I felt a little scared to walk around the building. The host said it's very safe, but it's better to be more cautious for a single traveller.
Tiny cosy clean room with a great location
Great location with fashion facilities.recommend it to everybody. Great host. Thank you for hosting.

Rita's place is just what you need for a couple nights in the heart of Shanghai! It is very clean and located right next to the 2 and 12 subway line. I would definitely recommend.

strongly recommend!

Hubert is very dependable and responds extremely quickly. Everytime that I needed something from him he would respond in a jiffy. If you're looking for a place that's affordable and has the cutest cat on the planet, Hubert is your guy!
Perfect place if you want to visiting Fudan University.
Very clean. Host tried hard to create a good environment. If the location is clear, and don't set expectation too high for guest, it will be good.

The toilet was outside the flat. This info wasn__ disclosed in the profile and it__ quite shocking for foreigner knowing this. 

The toilet was fine when I came but then it literally smell like poop after one use (probably the loo was not properly installed). The toilet__ exhaust wasn__ properly installed as well, so it couldn__ flush the inside air.

There was little ventilation and natural lights inside the flat, because the owner made the backyard into second bedroom.

Speaking of the second bedroom, the mattress in the second bedroom was out of shape in the right side.

However, the bed sheets and towels were sparkling clean and fresh. The owner could be reached at late night due to internet__ problem (kudos for that). The internet was really fast (300M) but mobile reception (China mobile and China unicom) was really bad inside the flat. The location was really good, about 500m from ä¸__è·_ and lots of restaurants and malls nearby.

All in all don__ expect international standard, just expect chinese national cleanliness (like you need literally wear slippers inside toilet and all time in the flat). The owner speak limited english, so make sure you could speak chinese. At least she was really responsive, polite, and helpful.
Overall its okay, just the toilet its not comfortable because its located outside
Aya room is very nice, fully equipped, I made a good meal, and spend very good time there, and there is a good balcony too, I think even for the long-time stay is good choice.

Simply awesome!!!

One of the best Airbnb experiences I__e had so far - quiet neighborhood (one of the older communities around; historical building), amazing old-fashion-meets-industrial-design kind of room decor. Grey+pink beautiful and consistent tone in the apartment. Big balcony and super clean bathroom & kitchen - everything is on point!

Traffic:
Calling taxi using DiDi is fast and convenient and can get you anywhere in town within 30 mins. Kinda close to the clubs/bars in the bund/Jing__n district/downtown.

Going Out:
Right next to the bund (POP American Diner is good with a view). If you are gay, it__ close to Lucca 390 & LG Club.

Hospitality:
Fast response. Host offered phone number and (Hidden by Airbnb) account for contacting her. Ran out of shampoo/lotion during my stay and she bought a whole pack online and shipped to the door.

Plus:
Cute nice projector for movies and TV. There__ a entry-level guitar in the room for you to play. The couch feels super cozy. Grocery store across the street.

5-star for sure! You deserve it.

The location is central with easy subway access. The whole apartment is very cozy, sparkly clean and equipped with everything you need. Aya has been a very patient and helpful host. Highly recommend for single/couple travelers!

This is definitely one of my OH MY GOD experiences with Airbnb.  The apartment is like this little treasure place hidden in the middle of historical Shanghainese neighborhood.  Yet the apartment itself is so modern and chic.  I__ so well designed and decorated that I took so many pictures and I will definitely want some of the elements in my own apartment.  The host is apparently very artistic with the guitar and painting and everything.  I__ recommend to my friends visiting Shanghai, and I__ definitely revisit it some time again!

This apartment suits u perfectly if u look for a few days of stay for getting a closer look at the common life in Shanghai. 

First, it is located in an easy-to-find old community. It__ old, but clean and tranquil. Different from the outside, decorations inside the apartment are modern, cozy and comfy. U can either enjoy getting ur delivery food within 30 minutes as there are so many local restaurants and foreign restaurants nearby, or u can even go to the supermarket just two blocks away for groceries to prepare ur own meals. Metro stations are also in the neighborhood. It__ also not far from the North Bund where u can have a better view of the riverside without getting stuck in the crowds. 

Second, the amenities are cool, especially the water heater! After a whole day__ ramble, u can enjoy a hot shower in just a few seconds! Cuz the heater is a gas one and it__ tucked inside a little box in the kitchen. And BTW, the kitchen is separated from the living room and the bedroom, or the balcony. So even if u make dishes of strong smell and smoke, u can simply close the door from the kitchen to the living room. It__ just so considerate about how the apartment was designed. 

Last but not least, the owner Aya is really responsive. U don__ need to worry about delayed replies to ur pre-booking or post-booking concerns, cuz that will never happen. 

The apartment is good for single goers and couples, especially for those who look for a place to balance eating outside or cooking for themselves.
The room is decent but the bed was shaky and noisy. Located in an old residential community with alot of weird smell. Not recommended if you can't take the smell and the environment.
Very nice. I suggest it to everyone
Aya's place is simply amazing and Aya herself is such an incredible and accommodating host. The small touches to her home was lovely. The location is also excellent. I highly recommend her.

The apartment itself is fine, just like the photos. Clean, spacius and with a comfortable bed. The problem is that there is a big contrast with the building and area where it is located. The building is very dirty and smelly. It seemed that nobody had ever cleaned common spaces, such as the elevator.
Very cozy place and comfortable, an awesome host!

A beautiful stay at Aiya's. 
A stylish and convenient spot in a semi historical surburb.

Miki prepared her place very well. The check-in process was easy and convenient. The highlight was the Yunan red tea she prepared. It__ a nice experience to enjoy a nice cup of tea after a busy day. Would like to come to her place next time.
Really nice stay during the whole week and had  excellent experience. It's very convenient for the location, the traffic and all about life. The room is clean and comfort. Better than expectation!
The landlord and assistant extremely helpful, great apartment, really quiet and easy to get to, but, a bit out of the way.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
We had a great stay. Very clean place, had all we needed. Well located close to good bars and restaurants. Great price.
Top experience I__e ever had. Very nice host and clean room. It should be a __trongly recommended _ property. And btw I have to say the location is great!!
Yolanda__ apartment is perfect, spacious and clean.  It__ conveniently located near to Long Yang station. She is very detailed and give all required information in advanced. Highly recommend .
Really clean and tidy apartment with good taste host

Affordable place, not far from the metro. The bed is comfy and the tv works (sometimes). It__ important to know the host only offers 2 face towels in the bathroom, no extra bedsheets or actually cutlery. The place smells bad because of the mold (kitchen and bathroom). The shower door does not close properly so it__ impossible to have a shower without flooding the bathroom. There is no drain there nor any mop! The fridge is leaking water and microwave is rly rly dirty. It was a real hassle to shower there (I had to buy towels and sponges as I could not find where to buy a mop...) Next time I will pay a little extra for the added comfort. The place is not expensive and the host responds quickly, she does offer toothpaste, toothbrush and shampoo.
Perfectly located tiny apartment. Great opportunity to get familiar with the local community and life style. Clean and cozy

Very good location and experience. The host is ready to assist you online at any moment you need. Aircon worked perfectly even in January.  Got everything sorted well in a tiny yet comfy place.  The place is rather quiet despite situated on the first floor with proximity to an alley.
Host is very polite and responds quickly, place is like described and location is awesome. Had a great weekend staying at Haibin's place!
Room is small but contains everything you need, sufficient for solo travellers. Conveniently located in the downtown area near the metro and big shopping malls. A lot of food near the accomodation.

henry was very kind and quick to respond. the place is in a fantastic location. it's on the dingy side, though. the bathroom needs a good scrub down and there are stains on the walls. they didn't wash the pillow case or duvet cover so the bed smelled like another person. the very kind cleaning lady provided a new pillow case and a whole duvet (i don't think she knew to take just the cover off!). overall, a decent place to sleep, but maybe not hang out in.
The host canceled this reservation 21 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great stay! Thanks for the help.
Thank you, Rita! It was really pleasant to be at your place_¤ï_ the accommodation was clean and cozy, with cute cat :) near metro which is really important
Great location, great value. Comfortable bed.

Stayed at Wei__ for 2 weeks and I very much enjoyed the stay. Wei is nice and easy to get along with. Her place is in a central area and easy to reach by metro and not far from Hongqiao airport by taxi is only 20 mins. Throughout the stay I felt comfortable ^^ I would not hesitate to recommend her place.
Wei is a lovely host . Her place is clean and quite. Very typical of Shanghai lilong. I enjoy my stay there a lot !

Wei, is very friendly and always answering my text message very quickly. The apartment is extremely well located making everything easy to reach also close by the metro line 2 which conects all the city . Unfortunately, my staying was for few time but I will be back for sure!
Wei was a wonderful host, quick at responding and helping me a lot. Location is super convenient and the apartment is quite charming and lovely~
Great apartment and especially the amenities; we enjoyed the stay. Thanks Terry.

This apartment is really nice and it has everything I needed, as it is located in the French concession there many coffee shops and places to eat nearby, the host really cared about every little detail of my stay, I would definitely recommend her.

Very charming apartment. Cute, well designed and decorated, all equiped. Ideally located: 5min walk from the subway, 10-15 minutes walk to IAPM mall (or 1 subway stop). Great if you are looking for a convenient and comfortable nest during your Shanghai trip. Did I mention it's also just between a fantastic cocktail bar (Pocho) and an amazing french bakery (Pain Chaud)? Well now you know!!
Perfect location in the French concession,  cozy and artistic decoration, helpful host with prompt response and flexible checkin policy. Highly recommended!

I have read many reviews before landing on Leina__ place, and it was an incredible decision. Leina__ place is suitable to stay for however long you will need/want, as opposed to others marketing with Shanghai style but not quite livable. I was impressed by this place with both drip coffee maker and French press, Kitchen stuff with named brands, and of course Leina__ #1 hospitality. Selfish, cheap, childish, terrible, dishonest landlord who I had never met before. It said 2 bed room, but only one can be used.  Otherwise, it will be charged. Actually, other small bed room is located by the bathroom with all bad smell. Only one AC can be used. If I turned on the other one, I need to be charged. Our rent was included the breakfast. I request the more food, they had no response. The worst thing is landlord came 2 days before we left said we turned on the second AC again and caused the neither complain. In fact, we never did it_. Cloe's place is a true gem in a beautiful area. The building itself is made entirely in red bricks and its old but so beautiful. The renovation she has done on her place is spectacular. The days we were in Shanghai were a bit cloudy and hazy but thanks to the large skylight, we were able to feel natural light. The place itself is sparkling clean and nothing to complain about and CloÃ© was a wonderful host always quick to respond and sent us great suggestions on where to visit.

owner did the floor polishing on the day we arrived so there was overpowering smell in the hallway during our stay. and we unfortunately  met the construction which caused great noise from 5:30 in the morning until afternoon. owners did their best to solve the problems but these affected our experience more or less.

it's a very nice place, the location is great! Beautiful neighbourhood! I recommend it!

Really the best place in Shanghai. Very close to the old street, not too far from a metro station, bus station is even closer. Owner treats you like family, and animals and plants make this place special. _¤ï_ I will never forget it and would come back without a consideration. I already miss it!

The host is very friendly, and The location of house is very convenient.
There is also a beautiful yard with many green trees
very nice place to stay and very cute dogs Thanks very much

Chelsea's place was better than I expected. We were apparently the first foreigners to stay in her place so she gave us welcome gifts and food. She took us to this local rooftop place wherein you can see a the bund. Very near to Nanjing east road about 2 blocks.

The place itself was a catch already. Stylish, clean and very well kept. The idea of it being an old perfumery was so cool. The neon halogen lights were great too, kinda sets the mood.

I highly recommend her place for tourists coming over!

The house very artistic, just renovated and quite new, same as photos. The place quite convenient very close to the bound and Nanjing Street. Lots of foods and bar near by. Also convenient store just next to the building. 
The host very kind give us lots of suggestions about food and drink.
Definitely worth staying!

i spent 10 days over the new year__ period here, and i have NO regrets at all. the location is spectacular if you want to be near the bund; it was walking distance to many attractions and restaurants/bars. the space is stylish, the bedroom heaters were a godsend during the cold winter, and it was great having two bedrooms/bathrooms between my friend and i for 10 days, since we could each maintain our own private space. 

the only thing i wish were different was that the hot water could__e been hotter (but it was still manageable and as expected of an old heritage building). and you can__ use the hot showers in both bathrooms at the same time unless you want to be doused in freezing cold water at intervals. i don__ foresee this to be a problem during summertime though!

chelsea as a host is also very responsive on (Hidden by Airbnb) , and she helped bring more toilet paper for our extended stay when we needed, and she fixed the bathroom light when it got stuck. i also appreciated her recommendations for food and drink - so delicious, thank you so much! and also her suggestions of hangzhou, suzhou and nanjing for day trips were on point. 

overall, the superb location alone is worth staying here, and i would 100% stay here for a holiday next time :)
Lovely stay. great location near the bund. very stylish place.
Very warm-hearted landlord, will share the local knowledge and recommendations to the tenant.
Chelsea's place was great! Wonderful location and Chelsea is super helpful and responsive leading up to the stay. Walking distance to the Bund and metro, exactly what we were looking for :)

Chelsea__ place is great!!! Best location. Easily walk to all the attractions. Close to subway station. The place is super clean and stylish. Chelsea put a lot of thoughtful touches. Chelsea is super sweet. Quick responses. Highly recommended!!

The location is superb! Chelsea__ place is just walking distance to the bund and nanjing east pedestrian street! Other attractions are also generally near. She was quick in her replies and was very helpful as well! A very lovely lady! 

The building looks old from the outside, but once you open the door, it__ completely opposite. The home was nicely designed and comfortable. Definitely worth the stay!
Chelseas place is soooo near the bund its walkable which is a very big factor for an awesome experience in Shanghai. The host communicates quickly if you have questions
Great location. Chelsea was super helpful with suggestions and things to do.
Awesome and clean Airbnb! Chelsea was also a great host - quick and prompt in her response :)

We had an unfortunate stay at Chelsea__ and had to leave after our first of five nights due to issues with her apartment from her downstairs neighbours. Travelers should be weary this building is very old, damp and dark, as such there is poor plumbing and restrictions when staying here around toilet usage etc. so we honestly found it best to just stay in a hotel which is secure and clean. Chelsea however was easy to communicate with both leading up to and during the stay and providing recommendations on local cafes and bars etc.

The apartment is very well located (a few blocks away from the Bund). Chelsea gave as great tips about Shanghai. We used public transportation and Didi app to travel around Shanghai. We had a great time! Thank you Chelsea!

DO NOT STAY HERE  - Do not trust these reviews the building is a run down dump and the apt is dark, small and not nice at all. We booked based on all the great reviews however I am very suss how they got there now. On the first night the tap broke off and flooded the apt. We had to move at 1am to a hotel as it was not fixable. The owner was very sorry then changed her story and tried to blame us and tried to extort from us AUD $500 to fix her faulty tap. Ahhhhhhh how ridiculous we went thru hell and back trying to save her apt from the water gushing out and this is how she returns the favour. You have been warned stay here and bring your bathers as you will need it.
Ideally located in a very local place

Chelsea is very helpful and responded message promptly. She welcomed us with a banquet of fresh flowers when we checked in to her house. 
The location is good as just 5 mins walk to The Bund. And I think police station is just around because there's a lot of police car (__è½) surrounded. 
Just a little bit of disappointment on the bathroom water pressure. It will be flooded when you showering.

I booked this listing because of how nice and clean it appeared and the fact that it had a kitchen. The only thing that was clean in the unit were the bedsheets. Nothing else appeared to have been cleaned before our arrival. The kitchen was disgusting, filthy, and rotting food on the counter and unplugged refrigerator. The bathroom had not been cleaned and was filthy from the last tenants. It took me an hour to clean the bathroom to a usable condition. There were no towels provided and the host told us to go buy some and we reimbursed us. The living room and common areas still had the mess from the last tenants, and the floors in the entire unit were filthy. The door keypad did not work properly and we had to contact the host every single time we wanted to come into the unit. One day we waited outside in the cold for 50 minutes waiting for him to respond with a new code. He eventually came to the unit to fix the door and partially clean the kitchen. It was very clear that this unit had not been cleaned between the last stay and ours and this is unacceptable. 

The good things about this property were location, views, and overall size of the unit. If it had been clean this would have been an absolutely perfect stay. The host was communicative and friendly. The unit (aside from the cleaning issues) was large and comfortable. The heating worked well, plenty of hot water, and great views from the bedroom and living room. The surrounding neighborhood is awesome, lots of restaurants and shops with a very local feel. Only a 15 minute walk or short bus ride to the subway station and lots of busses close by.
Tout est parfait! L__ppart est magnifique & bien situÃ©!

Jennifer__ place is a cute place to stay at. The picture is as is and has all the amenities needed. The location is great and safe. The only thing is that it is a bit far walk from the metro station, but other than that it is close to everything within 1/2 mile from the bund. Jennifer is quick to respond and very helpful and will try her best to help when needed. I highly recommend Jennifer__ place!
Very nice place and good location. Jennifer is a great host!

Amazing location, the room can briefly see the Shanghai tower. 
Interiors and details of the room is amazing and very modern, feels like I was living in an apartment in Paris

Jennifer helped us arrange to stay in two apartments right next to each other as we were two couples traveling together needing our own space. The apartments were exactly as described and very comfortable. We were near the Bund, exactly where we wanted to be, transportation by bus, taxi, and subway were all very convenient and easy to get to from this location. Jennifer responded to all of our messages very quickly. We did not have any problems or issues with anything, but I feel certain that if we did, Jennifer would have helped us resolve any problems quickly. There was a washing machine in both apartments with laundry detergent provided which was very nice. We very much enjoyed our stay and highly recommend staying at Jennifer__ apartment.

I loved the apartment! It__ very modern, exactly the style you would like to see on (Hidden by Airbnb) . The bed is also close to the window, that__ great for fresh air. The water pressure was good, but the water tank is not huge, so it__ good for 2 people at a time.

I also loved that Jennifer was very fast to respond to our concerns on (Hidden by Airbnb) . We asked for more towels and she had the maid drop some more in the next moments. Thanks!
Great interior design,  compact but considerate.   Very comfortable experience to live in Jennifer__ house.

Jennifer was an great and helpful host. The apartment was super clean with necessity amenity.  She even allow us to store our luggage before check in. We met her housekeeper, they are so friendly and caring, they even offer my daughter Chinese pancake after seeing her so hungry.

Convenient location, minutes of walk from the Bund.  cozy setting, cleaning likely done by next door hotel staff.  The only issues are there are constructions in the immediate vicinity and restaurants are five minutes walk away.
Comfortable, well equipped house and good views. Quiet neighbourhood only 30 mins walk from the centre.
Jennifer was very thoughtful and replied often any doubt, she provided great tips and getting to the apt. was easy, great location and easy to get around from.

The apartment is as beautiful as in the pictures. We really enjoyed staying there and Jennifer helped us a lot during the check in (thank you sooo much) and before our trip so we could not recommend it more.

Cute little apartment, walking distance from the bund and perfect location. Jennifer was an amazing host who made us feel welcome, sent many recommendations, and answered all questions we had during our stay. She also made the self check in easy and left great instructions. Strongly recommend!!
Jennifer__ place was beautiful, clean, cozy, quiet and best of all, the location is PERFECT!!!
It__ a cute place in high building- communication was really good and the building has a great bar on top.
The place was nice and the check-in process was super fast

Great place to stay in Shanghai. The location is perfect, very near to The Bund and Metro station. The apartment has everything you can need and more. Very quiet to sleep well. There is a beautiful bar at the roof of the building with an amazing view to the skyline.

Location is good, 20 min walk to the bund and about 30 to Nanjing road (shopping). The building is very old from the outside and the floors smell very bad and are badly lit. But the apartment itself though is very stylish!! You can tell the person who designed it has some talent. There were two bottles of water which was nice, otherwise no food. There wasn__ any housekeeping during our 4 day stay, so we had to use the same towels throughout the trip. There__ good AC, only bad thing is the remote is completely in mandarin so you don__ really know how to change the settings. View from the bed is priceless. We would stay again
The place is very well furnished and looks stylish. Perfect location. Hosts are very nice and easy going. If you__e planning a long trip - that__ your choice
Awesome accommodation. Decoration was up to date and really beautiful and comfy. Provided ideas and inspiration for our home design

Jennifer's place has a good location close to the Bund . For more distant places we took a taxi or walked to the closest subway station, Tiantong Road (15 min). Her apartment was very clean and looked as shown on Airbnb. Bed and sofa were comfortable. Would go back again in the future.
Great location, easy and comfortable communication with host
Very clean and stylish place. Also it's very comfortable to stay. The location is great and close to the Bun.

The host never sent us the code to enter the unit. We arrived at 2am with no way to access the unit. We called, texted, and messaged the host multiple times and received no response. We eventually had to book a hotel, which was totally inconvenient and not our plan. The unit is nicely styled. The location is close to the Bund, and a 15 minute walk to the nearest metro, 25 minute walk to the French concession. We noticed cockroaches in the bathroom every night, which was quite off-putting. Overall, I would not recommend staying at this apartment.
Great stay in Shanghai, thanks Jennifer!

Thanks for hosting me for a week. The location is very convenient and the decoration is stylish. Well communication with the host and I can reach them easily while my stay, although there's a construction site downstairs that causes noise during daytime.
Place was smaller than expected but comfortable nonetheless.

Location was no problem, room was stylish and clean.
It was cold because the comforter was thin.
Fantastic staying at Shanghai, worth way more than the price

Toni made my Shanghai visit really easy. Her hospitality was excellent. As a Native English speaker she helped me sort out everything that I needed to have a good time here.
From helping me sort out my metro card to making sure I didn't get ripped off when getting a sim card, she's really trustworthy and kind.
The place is really central to the metro and to the main key locations Shanghai has to offer. The room is tidy and comfortable, the lounge and kitchen was clean. I felt at home and I feel made a great friend in Toni. Fantastic!
Best location near line 7, everything is convenient and Toni is super nice
This is a great place to stay! The host are both nice and the cat is very cute too! If I come to Shanghai again, this place will always be my first choice!
Enjoyed my stay. very fast response, very clean place. And the cat was a very warm host.

Nice room on top of a building. House dirty but room clean. Nice and extraordinary view. Unfortunately no kitchen

The address is wrong. The place is further from the subway station. The apartment is hard to find as it__ inside a large compound with no clear numbering. Also, the  door downstairs was locked at 10pm when we were checking in. The address given later via (Hidden by Airbnb) was to the wrong door. An ayi came to help open the door. The apartment smells moldy but it was one of the only options in the area so it might be relatively good value if needing to stay there.
Great view from one of the bedroom. Location of the stay is great as Sharon had described. It__ near 96 Square shopping center, it got a lot of great food selection.
Sharon's place is very clean and close to everything, Starbucks coffee and shopping mall, also safe with security guard downstair and remote key for entrance
Sharon is kind and always provide quick response whenever I have questions. The apartment is easy to find with her detailed orientation.
Apartment is beautiful and host is very friendly. It__ in a great location close to shopping centres, restaurants and public transport. Nice place to stay in Shanghai.
Wonderful host and place. Stayed during visit to East China Normal University. Beautiful, clean and comfortable. Excellent WiFi. Will be back next time I come to the university.

Very aesthetically pleasing interior despite in a rather old neighbourhood. The place is completed with everything you will need for a short stay. Although the location is a bit far from the city centre without public transport nearby, it is of great value.
Nice n cosy place, except the surrounding area was dirty n noisy

stayed here for a week, and loved it every single day and minute of it, it__ so comfy, homey, and beautiful place, we had every basic things that we need, even kitchen amenities and spices to cook, located on the 2nd floor, a lil bit far from the gate and there are quiet noises around the apartment because of the neighbors, a lil problem with the AC in the bedroom bcs it__ not hot when it__ too cold or it__ not cool when the day is hot, and it make a lot of noises, but overall are great!

The room is located in a huge residential area, and is on the 7th floor, WITHOUT ELEVATOR. The host don't mention it on the description, so if you have a lot of luggage or don't want to climb everyday, just pass your way.
There are a total 4 bedrooms in the apartment, so 3 other roommates.
The room isn't very big but it's ok for one person. I also noticed that the window is not closing properly, there is a small gap, so I could hear every sound from outside. The bed is very uncomfortable.
The whole apartment was very dirty when I arrived, even though the host took 50RMB for cleaning fees, I had to clean myself everything.
The host is very quick to answer any question, however she is delivering the key but herself, and I had to wait outside for almost 1 hour on the day I moved in, because she was late.
Concerning public transportation, the room is located between two metro stations, you need to walk 15 minutes or 20 minutes for line 9. 
Overall, my stay was not amazing, but considering the high prices of Shanghai's houses, it has a quite good value for money.
excellent host and excellent place. Will visit again the next time in Shanghai.

Overall ok experience. Good location, reasonbley sized room, Only small compliants:
1. The place is not as well kept as the photos indicated. All the nice decor were gone and all the plants are either dead or missing. Bed does not have the canopy as the picture shown.
2. Basic living essentials were not provided adquately such as toilet paper, trash bag. We were asked to get it ourselves because this is not a hotel it's airbnb
3. Living room TV only has pay-to-view. Not even basic TV channels. If you are an infrequent traveller to China, good luck trying to watch any TV. Maybe bring a HDMI cable as a back up.
4. Water pressure at shower is so low that I feel like back in San Francisco.
Its a very clean place and the location was great! Few bars literally 30 seconds away. Ava was very quick with her responses too! Definitely recommend

This room has everything we needed for a comfortable stay. Location wise was just Okay if you don't mind walking 15-25mins to tourist attractions & metro station. The building itself is abit old and dark on the corridors. Definitely an affordable and nice stay.

Carol__ place is so cute, located at the center of Shanghai, and super cozy. The decoration__ spot in vintage but also clean and fresh look and feel. Everything__ tiny but exquisite and homie. Def would recommend to stay and would love to revisit in the future!
Carino e caratteristico, permette di scoprire una Shanghai reale, in un contesto ricercato e dal sapore vintage. Ottima la comunicazione con la host che parla molto bene inglese. Consigliato!

Very nice play for one person to stay, the location is excellent for foreigners.

I had a nice stay at this place. It's really super tiny and there is no window to the outside from the room itself, but there is a window just outside on the landing - so if you want natural light you have to open the door. To explain the setup a bit - it's a little private room within a lane house, the atmosphere is very local and not too polished (which was fine for me!) and I have no complaints about the cleanliness of the room, the tiny space is set up well, and the private bathroom (downstairs from the room itself) is nice. Perfect location and great for a short stay if you're happy with the slightly quirky setup!

Exactly what I needed.  this is a room for a single person who is just looking for a private room to relax in while exploring Shanghai.
the room is small, but the bed is comfortable, the little touches were very nice and the location was perfect.

This was my first stay in China and I wasn't sure what to expect but the room had everything I needed. I had quite a bit of trouble finding the place but Anno was quick to respond and I got there in the end. The setup is a bit weird but there's lots of nice touches to make it comfortable.  Location is fantastic, near plenty of restaurants and close to the metro. It's also very safe, I walked around at night with no problems. This place would suit a solo traveller looking for a simple room to crash in for a few nights. As long as you're not expecting a five star hotel you'll be fine.

I had a pleasant stay in Shanghai at this cozy place. Host was timely in his responses and accommodating to requests. Wonderful little details in the room that gives it a more personal at home feel. Very reasonably priced too considering it__ located in a very convenient area. Would recommend to solo travelers.
clean and comfortable for one Traveller.

Very comfortable room. I came during winter and anno had included a very warm heater so I slept like a baby. The location is prime. There's a lot of hip shops around and I definitely felt very safe in the neighborhood. The location is great since its right by changshu Station. However I did have an initial hard time finding the place. I managed to find it because I had a VPN and used my (Hidden by Airbnb) maps, but without that luxury, I would recommend printing out the (Hidden by Airbnb) map and map out direction/exit you will take.

The trip started off bad but the host was awesome and communicated with me while she was aboard! She responds to messages quick and if very nice! I probably wouldn__ come back in the winter since the bathroom is outside the room and gets cold while taking a shower! But in all a good room for a single person! Location is prefect! Located in the French concession area! A lot of restaurants and coffee shops!!
Small place, 4 m2 garret, ceiling from 2.2 m to 1 meter...rest room in another floor, so you have to go downstairs.
Spent few days in the small but homey room. The location is nice and the host is fantastic ! I__ love to call it a satisfying experience!

An old district in Shanghai I may say, the house itself is quite traditional, I feel like I am one of the movie characters of those art movie. The location of the place is absolutely good! Just a few minutes walk to the Subway, then you can access any famous tourist location in Shanghai. The street around the place is also very nice, lots of good bar for you to choose if you want to grab a drink. Convenient store access the road, you won__ get hungry during midnight!

Anno__ place was exactly as what it was described, it was small but it got everything that you needed, you got a private bathroom down stairs, it was very clean, you got a portable heater in the room, it really works well that kept you warm in a few minutes. The host also said that if you feel cold when you take a shower you could bring that down stairs to warm up the bathroom first before taking a shower, that really works for me. The host is living next door which he always says that if I need any help I could just knock his door and ask, a very nice person. He gave me a lot of travel advises, places to go and recommended authentic Shanghai cuisine, they were very helpful! The building was easy to find, an old French building which represents Shanghai culture, it was not polished but it was totally fine for me! As long  as the rooms were clean. Overall very pleasant staying at Anno__ house and will recommend to people who travel to Shanghai along, the location was great and the price was really cheap in that area.
This place was perfect, a bit small, but the location is just amazing, best of Shanghai, I'll stay here again for sure
Great for a solo traveller. Beautiful and safe neighbourhood. Anno is an understanding host and responds very quickly!
Small but clean and good for the price. All I needed was a bed to sleep in and this place suited me just fine.
Such a cute little room at a good location, perfect for a single traveler that just needs a nice place to sleep!

The room itself is small, clean, very cutely set up, and in a wonderful neighborhood. The bathroom down the stairs and the hallway to the room are a little off-putting, and the room itself is pretty much a closet. But it__ tidy and clean.
Anno's place is conveniently located and a good place to explore Shanghai. Anno is fast and attentive.

The place is clean and in an excellent location as described. But my stay was not as pleasant as expected, because there was a constant smoke smell and I woke up with a sore throat. There was a Dyson air cleaner but does not resolve the smoke issue. Even I suspect the smoke may come from the neighbor, which is not Anno's responsibility, but the ventilation could be improved.
For the price, it__ unbeatable. It__ a cozy little room that you can leave your stuff in. Nothing more, nothing less

Fantasic place in the trendiest neighbourhood in shanghai. Anno__ place is perfect for solo travellers needing an affordable and convenient place to stay in Shanghai. 

The room is on the small side but it has everything you need, you also get your own toilet with washing machine downstairs, which is very clean. The room can get a bit stuffy but the Dyson fan really helps.

The location is AMAZING, you have loads of trendy cafe and bakery nearby, as well as traditional old Shanghai shops and restaurants, probably the best place to be in Shanghai Imo.

Don__ expect anything fancy. But for hostel prices, you really can__ go wrong with this property!!
Extremely small space, bathroom is separate from bedroom. Overpriced and not worth the money for the venue. The location is the only plus, but the map makes it difficult to find.

The apartment is in general good as described. But worth to note for future booking reference is that there is an individual room inside the apartment with stacks of server/computer systems making quite a bit of noice especially in the evening and also the heat makes the room too warm.
The communication was neither too good during the stay. The host was not reachable while I met issues

The location of the place is perfect with a 5 min bike to Jing An Temple, Ju Lu Lu and all the best bars and clubs in Shanghai. The apartment is so modern and clean my girlfriend would not stop talking about how pretty it is. However, the neighborhood is very old and dirty and extremely hard to find. There__ also a server room with loud ventilation next to the bedroom but once you closed all three layers of doors you shouldn__ be able to hear anything. Overall a great choice if you want to stay in the heart of downtown Shanghai for a reasonable price.

Very comfortable and stylish apartment. Great location, 5-10 min walk from Jiangsu Station (exit 2). Great food options steps away. Comfortable apartment felt like home. Easy to find. Jiangbing lady steps away for amazing breakfast. Also pizza and Brut Cafe steps away. Modern renovated apartment. Good laundry facility and ready to use hot water. Comfortable bed and pillows. I highly recommend.
Very nicely decorated and great place to stay. Easy check in as well

Great communication with Benjamin from the start. I had a very smooth check in. It__ a stylish apartment on 6th floor with no elevator. Be prepared to carry your luggage up and down the stairs. The apartment had what I needed for a 3 nights stay in Shanghai.

Great and stylist apartment in the heart of Shanghai city! Benjamin was a great host in assisting to my questions and needs. Overall a pleasant stay although it is located on the 6th floor with no elevator.

this place is a little gem once you find it 
everything from the bedding to the towels to leaving some detergent for the washing machine was done nicely
so quiet and stylish and only a few minutes to the metro and straight to downtown
Cozy room, good location, nice daylighting! Definitely would like to visit again next time in Shanghai.
It__ a nice house to stay. Will recommend to friends to stay.

One of the best airbnbs we've stayed at to date. Exactly as shown in pictures. Building is dated but the unit is renovated from head to toe with stylish decor.  Very spacious for our family of 2 plus baby. The kitchen was fully equipped. Washer/dryer and big screen tv was a plus. Traveler's tip: when staying here make sure to go downstairs across the street to buy the salted soy congee, dough sticks and green onion pancakes for an authentic chinese breakfast. The place has no name but is super tasty and cheap!!!

The apartment and check in process overall were good, but we have 3 remarks. First the apartment was not very clean: the floor was a bit dirty, some of the kitchen utensils were not properly cleaned, the basin in the bathroom also had dusts (additionally there was only one small roll of toilet paper for 7 nights and no shower gel). Second, the host was not very responsive (more than 24 hours between messages). An oven was advertised in the listing but it did not work. A few days after our complain, he told us he would fix it but never did. Third, he tried to offer us not to charge us the cleaning fee if we agreed to put a 5-star review. This is in my view clearly the worst as this goes clearly against the review system of Airbnb and makes me think that most of other people comments and reviews have been tampered.
Beautiful and clean apartment at 6th floor (no lift).
Really nice place to stay at, just be prepared that the house itself is not as nice as the apartment
I enjoyed my time staying there. Awesome experience.
The room is so stylish to stay.

Very well located, quite in the room and also very well equipped. Washer, dryer, Dyson pure cool, electric heater, etc.

The only thing which can be improved is the water system. The water pressure seems to be a little bit low, but there is no problem to fulfill the daily usage. 

To be concluded, very good stay, and it__ already in my favorite list!
Amazing stay! was centrally located and it had everything i needed!
Really good design & Decoration, I__ loving it.

This apartment was perfect for my needs. It is close to the Metro 2 line with easy access to all the main sightseeing spots. I was not prepared to carry luggage up so many stairs but I survived. Comfortable bed.
Really nice and convinient place to stay! Host is super nice and helpful. Location is reasonably good (switch to line 7 is easy). Room is spacious, bed is big. Price /quality -wise is a great deal.
Quiet and Comfortable place,Had a good experience;

The host is excellent. She went out of her way to accommodate me and responds very fast to all enquiries. She also provided additional documentation required needed to start my university course within 24 hours at no extra cost. I would definitely stay here if I went to Shanghai again. It__ very close to Shanghai Jiao Tong Minhang campus too.
ä¸ is definitely one of the best airbnb landlords I ever met. I__ like to recommend her places without any reservation!
We enjoyed staying here, the accommodation was very clean. Lee was so kind and helpful. She responded very fast and clear to any question that we had. Recommended!
The flat is small, but very comfortable and clean. The host was very helpful!
They are a super nice family, my days there were great, they helped me a lot and the place is sooo good and clean.
The family is very hospitable and shows great consideration,you can have a quiet,homey place to stay during your trip. Recommend for others

Easy check in, very responsive host, place is cozy but all needs are met for convenient stay. Good location to metro line 1/Shanghai Railway Station. Host is very nice and very quick to respond and help with any issue. Very kind guy :)

Cute little loft in a traditional Shanghai community! Great location just 2 mins walk from the subway station and near the large Huaihai Middle Road with tons of shops and restaurants. The location is not the best.  It is in a large complex of buildings so if you__e not familiar with it, the taxi driver will drop you off at the wrong gate and you get to walk with your luggage over a mile.   

Also make sure you get plenty of cash before leaving the airport as that area does not accept major credit cards. They only accept Chinese currency.  The ATMs nearby do NOT take visa, MasterCard, AMEX or Discover.  You can get cash in the downtown financial area of Shanghai. 

Leaving the airport, the taxi drivers will try to charge you $40 US dollars.  The max you should pay is $18.  They will flood you with requests.  Better to walk outside and find an independent driver, not one of the brokers.

Even though the train station is literally across the street from the unit, you have to walk a long way with luggage to the entrance/exit area.  

The restaurants and shops are a long hike away from the unit.  

All the plants are artificial and fake. They look good, but are all plastic.   

WiFi is not fast.  My mobile phone worked faster on 3G.  

I expected a lot more, but considering the price, you get what you pay for.  The place is nice and clean, but not what I was expecting.
It's a great place to stay and it is close to Disney land.

It was perfect location where i wanted and hostess is very responsive and kind. I highly recommend 
Thank you very much

We are unlucky that the cleaner didn't clean the house well and previous guests make the bathroom pipe blocked. Photos are true, the apartment is cute! But don't hold high expectation for the outdoor environment.

The apartment itself was nice, save for the carpet which was a little dirty and a bed that was slightly less than ideal. Good for those that leave/arrive in the day because the building had no corridor lighting when it is dark out. Neighbours were also a tad noisy at night with arguments that can be heard - but the inside of the place is ok:)

The apartment is spacious, well equipped, and conveniently located (within 10-min walking distance from Xujiahui station on Line 1 and Yishan Road station on Line 3/4/9). The neighbourhood was very home-like and would impress those who want to have an experience of living like a local!

Aisa and her team always responded promptly, and did their best to help with any problems that I had. I'm most grateful about them replacing the out-of-order projector almost right after I reported the issue, so that I can use it for catching up with my TV dramas when I got back from a long day of work!

A great location and stylish house , good for a short visit because there isn__ much space to unpack any clothes due to a lack any of storage . The host is very kind and responsive to any needs we had.
Fantastic location at a beautiful tree lined neighborhood in Shanghai. Yihans place was very accommodating and has unique interior details that make it a comfortable and fun stay!
Very nice place in a great location!

Great location! Couldn__ find anywhere is better than this location, it__ right in the middle of French Concession, on a quiet street and very convenience to travel. 

We would mostly thank for the host Yihan, she is extremely helpful, very quick to response, and such a trusty and honest person.

Super nice location, easy to get to everywhere. 
Quiet but can have a lot local experience. 
The building itself is really cool, in an old-style neighborhood, the interior design is also gorgeous. The host prepared almost everything you need to live in the house like in your own house. 
Definitely recommended!! (from a local shanghainese who host my friends there)

Beautiful old house full of character and with comfortable couch and beds in historical part of Shanghai (a bit out of the hustle / bustle). We had a few issues in the house with cleanliness (e.g. dirty fridge, unclean furniture in living room) - host was great in communication and sent the cleaning staff to come again after I messaged her about this. The other thing is,  I guess it happens in old houses - but there were several cockroaches in kitchen and bathroom, so if you're scared of them, this is not the right place :). Overall we enjoyed our stay.

Thank you we enjoyed our stay here. The property was quaint and comfortable. It is compact and there are stairs to climb so beware if that__ an issue. The bathroom limited in ventilation so feels a bit damp. It__ located in a convenient spot, close to subway and quiet street off major intersection. It__ a one way street, and some convenient stores close by. If there were instructions to help with locations this would have been very helpful. Otherwise, the property met all of our expectations and was our home for the 6 days in Shanghai. And the host was responsive and was very accommodating to our needs. Thank you!

The location is very good. Easy to locate and the accommodation is really good, I feel comfortable staying there. The bed mattress is a bit too soft for me, other than that, everything was good. I will recommend to my friends.

Hi guys, I would like to give you a quick feedback regarding my own experience. 

Let__ start from the host Yihan - a wonderful host indeed, very efficient & kind - thoughtful and know how to present the place comfortably. 

On top of the villa itself. Very cute and arty - exactly the images I saw on the website. Somehow - more than expected ;-) take it as a compliment pls. 

Location: very CBD area, locate in former French concession. You can catch the metro/cab easily here. 

Neighbor: mostly - mid age ppl here, just watch out if you make this house very __ye-catching_ they might be keep watching at you lol, but don__ be scared, they__e not bad guys lol. Maybe just curious. 

The house: brilliant, well designed with light luxurious bath room and very comfortable beds. 
1F - The living room is connected well with the kitchen (well equipped) plus a guest room 
2F - 2 bedroom next each other and 2 opened balcony (just take my notes as neighbors are curious about the guests lol, if you__e not an Asian face looking - you better speak mandarin lol kidding, just be polite) I love the bath tube so I did 3 times in total lol bring the LUSH, it won__ let you down. 

Mates, highly recommended... 
looking forward to staying here another time!

I stayed at Bolton__ apartment with my 4 girls for the weekend and it was amazing. The location was perfect for us, near the metro, close to shops and restaurants. The apartment was very clean and provided us with everything we needed. The design was also a point to note, perfect atmosphere for our slumber party. The only thing is that there is no door to the bathroom, but for us girls, it wasn__ such a big deal. If you__e looking for a place to stay for a girls night out in shanghai, would definitely recommend this place!
Very funky and stylish, like an 80s music video. Great pad in the heart of Shanghai, easy communication with the host. Would recommend.

Home was very nice and modernist style , Clean , Big home. Located in center walk from metro about 5 mins. You can find anything you want here.Host is very nice and helpful. Recommended to stay here !!

This apartment was really conveniently located. It is right on the south shanxi road station with three subway lines within a 5 minute walk. 
The apartment itself is not huge but really well set up. It was more than enough for our family of four and could easily accommodate more people. The old shanghai lane it is in adds a bit of charm to the whole thing.

I went there as everyone gave the five stars! But for us it was a bit disappointing as it was a bit dirty, the rooms were dark and the kitchen was smelly. no doors at the washroom + rooms and shower and toilet together but I guess it can be normal. 

Okay to stay and good value for money. 
The location is great.
beautiful and cozy place and neighborhood.

This is a beautifully decorated apartment in a nice neighbourhood of Shanghai (there are many lovely shops and restaurants around, we especially recommend the bar __itter_). Checkin is easy, communication (in English) quick, and there is even a room for storing your luggage around the corner. The apartment is situated in a backyard, which is a bit dark, but we felt safe. It is rather small, but the maisonette style makes it more comfortable. Please note that the apartment does not provide large towels, but the owner was so nice to bring some upon request. It has a fridge and a hot plate, but not enough utensils for proper cooking. The shower has good water pressure, but the bathroom itself is very warm and humid. The apartment has A/C and a fan upstairs, but no windows to open - except the main door. The neighbours can be heard, especially in the morning, but earplugs were provided. All in all, it__ not the most __ractical_ apartment, but the price is good with regard to the beautiful style and the nice neighbourhood, so we would definitely come back.

Really enjoyed our stay at å¿____ place. The unit was just as pictured clean, light filled and well thought out. Would recommend to those visiting Shanghai as this does feel like a home away from home with transportation at your door step to explore other parts of this amazing city.

Really amazing place and the host was super helpful!

Really amazing place that is super close to public transportation. The apartment was super clean and had everything to make my stay in Shanghai extremely comfortable. å¿__ was a wonderful host and really helped me figure out how to get to certain destinations. Thanks so much!!
Very good location. Perfect apartment, a lot of space, very clean and comfortable. Good price and quality ratio. Will definitely choose the same for the next time.
The host canceled this reservation 11 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Hey, get this place booked ASAP. You will regret if you don't. Best place!

The flat is very cozy and tidy! The host, Hui, is very nice girl who cooks very great and delicious breakfast. I have enjoyed my staying a lot in her flat.  Also, the flat very good location closed to MRT station. I recommend the room to anyone who wanna have a short stay in Shanghai.
Hui is a fantastic host, I can't recommend her apartment strongly enough. Thanks for helping me with everything Hui!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Hui is very good! Her home quilt is very comfortable, there is a big window, as her home is on the top floor, you can lie on the bed and see the sky directly. The room is very clean and she has everything you need for the day. It's also very close to the subway station.
